1b1(mdo sde): rgya ga gad du.Ar+ya be d+hisatwAk+Shi tig d+hA
1b2(mdo sde): sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bodani// skad du/ 'dus pa chen po las
1b3(mdo sde): ' phags pa byang chub semasadapa' sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu
2a1(mdo sde): / pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po dang po/
2a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
2a3(mdo sde): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri kha la te ya zhes bya ba na/ drang srong thub pa
2a4(mdo sde): mang po'i spyod yul gyi gnas na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang
2b1(mdo sde): thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po sha stag go/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems/
2b2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po// tshad med pa dang thabs cig pa thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po sha stag ste/ zla ba'i snying
2b3(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba bshad ma thag tu/ de'i tshe lho phyogs nas bsung gi sprin chen po 'dus pa las/ bsung gi char chen po rab tu 'bab bo//
2b4(mdo sde): me tog gi sprin chen po 'dus pa las/ me tog gi char chen po rab tu 'bab bo// rin po che'i lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin chen po 'dus pa las/
2b5(mdo sde): rin po che lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi char chen po rab tu 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin chen po 'dus pa las/ lha rdzas kyi gos kyi char chen po rab
3a1(mdo sde): tu 'bab bo/ / de lta bu'i sprin dang / char chen pos drang srong thub pa mang po'i spyod yul gyi gnas kyi ri de la khyab par gyur to//
3a2(mdo sde): bsung dang me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / gos de dag las rin po che'i sgra dbyangs rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong snyed grags par gyur pa ni/ 'di lta
3a3(mdo sde): ste/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i sgra dang / bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa'i sgra dang / ngang des shing bzod pa can gyi sgra dang / brtson
3a4(mdo sde): 'grus rtsom pa'i sgra dang / bdud bzhi btul ba'i sgra dang / shes rab la gzhol zhing 'jug pa'i sgra dang / grags pa chen pos 'jig rten gsum
3a5(mdo sde): du rgya cher grags pa'i sgra dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi khyad par la nan tan pa'i sgra dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
3a6(mdo sde): dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'dod chags kyis yongs su skyo ba'i sgra dang / gzugs ni chu'i lbu ba lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i sgra dang / tshor ba ni chu bur
3b1(mdo sde): lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i sgra dang / 'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i sgra dang / 'du byed ni chu shing lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i sgra dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i sgra dang / mi
3b2(mdo sde): rtag pa'i sgra dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sgra dang / bdag med pa'i sgra dang / stong pa'i sgra dang / 'dzem pa dang / ngo tsha bar ldan pa'i sgra dang / kun spong ba'i sgra dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i
3b3(mdo sde): sgra dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi sgra dang / chos kun chud pa'i sgra dang / mtho ris su skye ba nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra dang / theg pa gsum las
3b4(mdo sde): 'bab pa'i sgra dang / chos chen po'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i sgra dang / chos chen po'i char rab tu 'bebs pa'i sgra dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgra dang / ngan song gsum las yongs su
3b5(mdo sde): sgrol ba'i sgra dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par nan tan bya ba'i sgra dang / thabs mkhas pas sgra dang / sa bcu la 'bab pa'i sgra dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa'i sgra
3b6(mdo sde): dang / bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po rnam par dag pa la rnam par rol pa'i sgra dang / sa las phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i sgra dang / spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i sgra dang /
3b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgya mtsho chen po la 'jug pa'i sgra'i nga ro grags par gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyis de lta bu'i sprin dang / char pa rnam pa sna tshogs
4a1(mdo sde): mthong zhing / de ltar chos kyi sgra'i nga ro yang thos par gyur nas/ de dag gi so so'i yid ci la mos pa bzhin du so so'i lus la rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bsung dang / me tog dang
4a2(mdo sde): rin po che'i rgyan dang / lha rdzas kyi gos dam pas yongs su brgyan par mthong ngo // yang so so'i lag mthil gnyis na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs shing / yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de dag re
4a3(mdo sde): re las kyang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bab par mthong ngo // gzhan yang nor bu rin po che de dag las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gi dbang gis sems can
4a4(mdo sde): de dag so so nas/ phyogs bcu'i chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mthong ngo // yang 'od zer de dag gi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang 'khor
4a5(mdo sde): mang po tshad med pas bsti stang dang bcas te yongs su bskor bar mthong ngo / / gzhan yang 'od zer de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ sems can gang nad kyis gzir ba thams cad kyang /
4a6(mdo sde): 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu nad kyi sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur to// gang bsad pa la thug pa dang / btson du bzung zhing bcings pa dag kyang / 'od zer de dag gis reg ma thag tu de las yongs
4a7(mdo sde): su thar par gyur to/ / gang lus dang / ngag dang / yid mi dge bar spyod pa'i gnas ngan len lci ba dag kyang 'od de'i dbang gis shin tu yang zhing rnam par dag par gyur to// gang bkres shing skom pa dag kyang
4b1(mdo sde): 'drangs shing ngoms par gyur to/ / gang bsad pa dang / chad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nyon mongs par gyur pa dag kyang / 'od zer kyis reg ma thag tu sdug bsngal ba dang bral bar gyur to// gang bgo ba dang / rin po
4b2(mdo sde): che'i rgyan dang / dbyig dang / nor rdzas kyis brel cing phongs pa dag kyang bsams pa bzhin du 'byor cing ldan par gyur to// sems can gang srog gcod pa la dga' zhing mos pa nas/ log par lta ba'i bar du/
4b3(mdo sde): dga' zhing mos pa dag kyang / 'od zer des reg ma thag tu srog gcod pa yongs su spong ba la dga' zhing mos nas log par lta ba'i bar du yongs su spong ba la dga' zhing mos par gyur to// sems can gang dag
4b4(mdo sde): 'dod pa mi rnyed pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag kyang 'od zer des reg ma thag tu ji ltar re ba bzhin du rnyed par gyur to/ / gzhan yang 'od zer de'i dbang gis sangs
4b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sems can gang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa dag/ thams cad zhi nas rab tu zhi zhig bde ba dang ldan te/ thams cad bde ba dang ldan par mthong ngo // gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi
4b6(mdo sde): zhing de dag thams cad du 'od kyis snang bar byas pas/ sprin dang / rdul dang / na bun dang / rlung dang / rdzi char dang / bkra mi shis pa'i sgra dang / dri mi zhim pa dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba la sogs pa'i
4b7(mdo sde): ro ngan pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i reg bya dang / 'jigs skrag pa dang / gnod pa mang po'i rnams med par gyur to// gzhan yang las ngan pa dang / log pa'i ngag dang / log pa'i bsam pa dang / log
5a1(mdo sde): par phyogs pa dang yongs su bral te/ lhag par mi grang ba dang / lhag par mi tsha ba dang / rab tu zhi zhing bde ba dang / sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa dang / bde ba'i yo byad dam pa
5a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyis yongs su gang bar gyur to/ / de'i tshe na 'khor mang po rnams kyi so so'i lus kyi sa'i khams lhag par lci zhing mi theg pa tsam du gyur to// ltas 'di lta bur gyur pa mthong nas thams cad kyang dngangs
5a3(mdo sde): te/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis ltas 'di lta bur gyur snyam du rtog pa skyes so// de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na brgya byin lha'i dbang po dri ma med par skyes zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang yang mi ring ba
5a4(mdo sde): zhig na 'dug pa las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to//
5a5(mdo sde): bden par gsung zhing bden gzigs pa// bden la rab gnas thub pa khyod// 'dus pa'i 'khor mang thams cad la// mthar phyin bden pa'i chos gsungs shig/ so so'i skye bo mang po dag/ sdug bsngal rgyu dang sdug
5a6(mdo sde): bsngal sel/ / ci yi slad du 'khor 'dir ni// sprin dang char rnams gda' bar gyur// 'khor rnams rab tu dga' rangs nas// shin tu dad pa'i bsam pa skyes// theg pa chen por thams cad gzhol// yang dag lha
5a7(mdo sde): skye so ma nyi rgal/ / 'khor mang lha dang mi yi lus// lhag par sa yi khams lci bas// rang gi mi theg gyur pa 'di// ci yi rkyen gyis ltas 'di byung // lag mthil gnyis kyi nor bu las// rin chen char 'bab 'od kyang
5b1(mdo sde): 'gyed/ / phyogs bcur snang byas sdig pa bsal// sdug bsngal zhi nas bde ba thob// 'dren pas gsungs shig ci yi rkyen// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la// spos dang phreng ba sna tshogs kyis// so so'i lus
5b2(mdo sde): la brgyan pa gda'/ / lha dang mi kun the tshom skyes// ci yi rgyu dang ci yi rkyen// su zhig gang nas 'dir mchi na// rdzu 'phrul mthu 'di ston par gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am// 'on te tshangs pa
5b3(mdo sde): 'am bdud lags sam/ / brgya byin lags sam su mchi ga/ 'dren pa chen blo bshad du gsol// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dri ma med par skyes pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
5b4(mdo sde): to/ / khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par byos shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sngon bskal pa chen po tshad med grangs med pa'i bar du rnyog lnga'i tshe/ sangs
5b5(mdo sde): rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can yongs su smin par byed pa de/ da ltar 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad cu dang bcas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir nga
5b6(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / gzhan yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la lta ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba skyed pa'i phyir 'khor dang bcas te/ dge sbyong gi gzugs
5b7(mdo sde): kyis 'dir 'ong bas/ mngon par shes pa'i mthus cho 'phrul 'di dag bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po zhes bya ba de/ tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan gyi khyad
6a1(mdo sde): par gyis yongs su brgyan pas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad kyis dpag nus pa med do// byang chub sems dpa' de ni yon tan phul du gyur pa thams
6a2(mdo sde): cad kyi gter tu gyur pa'o/ / rnam par grol ba'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mig yongs su dag par byed pa'o// mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i ded dpon du gyur pa'o// yid
6a3(mdo sde): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ltar rin po che thams cad char bzhin du 'bab pas/ ji ltar re zhing 'dod pa thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa'o// tshong pa mang po'i rin po che'i gling lta bu'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing skye
6a4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir zhing gshin pa lta bu'o/ / rnam par grol ba'i bde ba la 'jog pa'i phyir snod lta bu'o// rin po che dam pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i phyir yon tan gyi bum pa bzang po lta bu'o// dge ba'i nan tan can la snang bar
6a5(mdo sde): byed pa'i phyir nyi ma gsal ba lta bu'o/ / lam stor ba rnams la snang bar byed pa'i phyir sgron ma lta bu'o// nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel ba'i phyir zla ba ltar sil ba lta bu'o// rkang pa med pa la theg par gyur pa lta bu'o//
6a6(mdo sde): lom ring por 'gro ba la tshogs kyi stegs lta bu'o// 'brog bslad pa la lam ston pa lta bu'o// smyos shing 'khrug pa la sman dam pa lta bu'o// nad kyis gzir ba la sman pa mkhas pa dang phrad pa lta bu'o// rgas shing
6a7(mdo sde): 'khogs pa la rten dang 'khar ba lta bu'o/ / ngal ba dang dub pa la khri stan lta bu'o// chu bo bzhi rgal ba la zam pa lta bu'o// pha rol tu 'gro ba'i gru dang gzings lta bu'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam gsum gyi 'bras bu'i khyad
6b1(mdo sde): par can smin par byed pa'o/ / dge ba rnam gsum gyi gzhi 'dren cing rgyun tu 'bebs pa'o// sbyin pa gtong ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa 'khor lo ltar 'jug pa'o// tshul khrims bsrung ba brtan pas ri rab lhun po lta bu'o// brtson
6b2(mdo sde): 'grus gzhig par dka' ba ni rdo rje rin po che lta bu'o/ / bzod pa mi g.yo ba ni sa chen po lta bu'o// bsam gtan zab pa ni gter gsang ba lta bu'o// mnyam par 'jog pas mdzes pa ni me tog gi 'phreng ba dam pa lta bu'o//
6b3(mdo sde): shes rab zab cing yangs pa ni rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'o// cis kyang mi chags pa ni nam mkha' lta bu'o// 'bras bu dam pa'i rgyu dang nye ba na me tog rgyas pa lta bu'o// mu stegs can 'dul ba la seng ge'i rgyal po lta bu'o// lha'i
6b4(mdo sde): bdud yongs su 'joms pa na klu 'am/ glang po che lta bu'o// nyon mongs pa'i dgra thams cad gcod pa ni lha'i ral gri lta bu'o// 'du 'dzi mang pos skyo ba ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa lta bu'o// nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khru ba ni
6b5(mdo sde): chu dang ba lta bu'o/ / mi gtsang ba'i nyal nyil sel ba ni rlung drag po lta bu'o// kun nas nyon mongs pas klags pa gcod pa ni/ mtshon sngon po lta bu'o// 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba kun las srung ba ni snyen nam 'dza'o lta bu'o// phas
6b6(mdo sde): kyi rgol ba'i dgra las skyob pa ni 'obs sam/ mkhar lta bu'o// nyam nga ba thams cad las grol bar byed pas pha ma lta bu'o// zhan cing nyam chung ba rnams sbed pa ni nags stug po lta bu'o// dbyar lam ring por 'gro ba la bsil
6b7(mdo sde): grib kyi shing chen po lta bu'o/ / tsha ba dang skom gyis gdungs pa rnams la chu grang lta bu'o// bkres pa rnams la 'bras bu zhim po lta bu'o// gcer bu rnams bgo ba'i gos byed pa'o// tsha bas nyen pa rnams sprin stug por gyur pa'o//
7a1(mdo sde): dbul phongs pa la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po cher gyur pa'o// 'jigs skrag pa dag la skyabs dang gnas su gyur pa'o// lo thog rnams la char bar gyur pa'o// chu rnyog pa can rnams la nor bu chu 'dang du gyur
7a2(mdo sde): pa'o/ / sems can mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mi 'god pa byed pas/ spyod yul dam pa ston cing 'khor spros pa dang tshim par byed pa'o// sems can rnams lhag pa'i 'dzem pa dang ngo tsha ba skul zhing 'dzud pa'o// bsod nams dang ye
7a3(mdo sde): shes kyi tshogs bsog pa la de'i rgyan dang ldan par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa yongs su sel ba la skyug pa dang / 'khrug pa'i sman lta bur gyur pa sems 'khrugs pa sdud pa ni mnyam par 'jog pa'i spyod yul lta bur gyur pa/
7a4(mdo sde): spobs pa thogs pa med pa ni zo chun rgyud ma'i 'khor lo lta bu'o// dmigs pa la sems sdud pa ni gzugs bzang po la rtog pa lta bu'o// bzod pa brtan pa ni ri rab lhun po lta bu'o// gzugs zab cing rgya che ba ni rgya mtsho
7a5(mdo sde): chen po lta bu'o/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thogs pa med pa ni nam mkha' lta bu'o// sgrib pa'i bag chags thams cad yongs su sel ba ni/ ji ltar nyi ma tsha bas 'khyag tsam tsam bzhu ba lta bu'o// rtag tu bsam gtan dang /
7a6(mdo sde): gzugs med pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam la rol cing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rin po che dam pa'i gling lta bur gyur par ched du ma bsams kyang / chos chen po'i 'khor lo rab tu skor ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar
7a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po de ni de lta bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa de/ 'khor dang bcas te gnas 'dir phyin tu nye bas/ 'od las 'di lta bu'i tshe
7b1(mdo sde): 'phrul dang / ltas sngar bstan pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i yon tan mang po bshad ma thag tu/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po// 'khor byang
7b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu dang bcas te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dge sbyong gi gzugs su ston cing / lho phyogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te/ 'khor mang po dang / bcom
7b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas/ 'greng bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par
7b4(mdo sde): bstod do/ / rnam par 'dren pa rkang gnyis mchog/ byams pa'i thugs kyis kun la skyob// sa chen ltar ni shin tu bzod// zhe sdang khro bo'i sems kun bsal// mtshan dang dpe byad mchog ldan pas// sangs rgyas
7b5(mdo sde): kun gyi zhing rab rgyan/ / bden pa'i byams dang snying rje yis// rgyal ba'i zhing kun rab tu 'gengs// sred pa'i dra ba kun bcad nas// yang dag ci bzhin bde bar gnas// yongs su dag pa'i zhing spangs nas// rnyog pa can gyi
7b6(mdo sde): sems can sgrol/ / rnyog pa'i zhing 'dir dam bcas te// ngan 'gro sems can smin par mdzad// yang dag brtan pa'i rtsol ba yis// ring mo zhig nas dka' thub spyad// yun rings dka' thub spyad pa dag/ thos na
7b7(mdo sde): 'jigs pa'i sems kyang skye/ / sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab spyad// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // tshad med nyan thos bsnyen bkur mchod// gzhan yang skye bo
8a1(mdo sde): mang po dag/ bkres skom na 'chi kun las bsgral// so so'i skye bo gzhan gyi phyir// lus srog ma chags mang du btang // yang dag dam pa'i chos tshol phyir// sha dang rus pa'ang mang du btang /
8a2(mdo sde): bdag gi bde ba kun btang nas// skye bo rnams la thugs brtser dgongs// so so'i skye bo mang po'i phyir// the tshom dra ba gcod la btson// dbang po drug rnams rab bsdams nas// 'dod pa thams cad ring du spangs// 'dus
8a3(mdo sde): byas mi rtag sdug bsngal te/ / bdag med stong pa nyid du rtogs// sdug bsngal las kun skye ba yi// rgyun 'dod chags sred pa'o// de phyir dbang po drug pas sngar// 'dod chags yongs su gcad par bya// sems can gnas pa'i
8a4(mdo sde): khams kun tu/ / rtag par thugs rje chen po gnas// byang chub mchog tu sangs rgyas kyang // sngon gyi smon lam kun mi gtong // sems can gang zhig sdug bsngal gyis// rnam par gzir ba dag zigs nas// shin tu 'bad
8a5(mdo sde): pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ / de las sgrol phyir rab tu brtson// sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan shes rab kun bsgoms nas// ji ltar ma ni bu gcig la// byams pa'i sems kyi gso ba bzhin// sngon yang
8a6(mdo sde): sems can ris kun la/ / rtag tu byams pa'i thugs bskyed pas// de phyir myur du sangs rgyas nas// tshad med pa yi 'khor rnams sgrol// ji tsam byang chub spyod bsgoms pa// sems can don du ma bsngos med// de bas sems
8a7(mdo sde): catsacan thams cad la/ / pha rol byin pa drug mi gtong // rtag tu dus ngan tha ma u0f7f// bla med byang chub bsgrubs pas na// da yang dus ngan tha ma'i che// bla med byang chub mngon sangs rgyas// ngan par lta ba'i lha klu mi// gnod sbyin n
8b1(mdo sde): gag ni kun btul te/ / the tshom gcod cing bder bkod pa// rdo rje lta bu'i lam la'o// tshad med pa yi skye bo dag/ byang chub mchog tu lung yang ston// mchod 'os 'dren pa'i gtsor gyur te// mchog gi bsod nams zhing du
8b2(mdo sde): gyur/ / dpe bla med pa'i bcom ldan 'das// byams pas 'gro ba kun la skyob// tshad med grags pa chen po yis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten yongs su khyab// de bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// bdag gi don tu bsgrub
8b3(mdo sde): ba'i phyir/ / kun nas lhan cig 'dir 'dus nas// thub pa chen po'i spyan sngar lhags// dam pa'i chos rnams thos nas ni// rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te// lhag par yang dag brtson bskyed nas// byang chub spyod/
8b4(mdo sde): la nan tan bgyid// rnam par 'dren pa'i chos kyi mthus// thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bas// de bas deng 'dir 'dren khyod kyis// bsdus pa'i 'khor ni sngon ma byung // gnod sbyin khri phrag bcu gsum snyed//
8b5(mdo sde): rtag tu sha za khrag 'thung ba// thams cad sdig pa'i las btang nas// byang chub chen por 'bab cing gzhol// kha cig khyad par gzugs mchog dang // bzod pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang thob// kha cig zag pa kun
8b6(mdo sde): zad nas/ / 'jig rten mchog gi dgra bcom gyur// kha cig tshad med bzhi bsgoms shing // kha cig bsdu ba bzhi la gnas// kha cig yang dag rigs bzhi thob// kha cig 'thun pa'i bzod la gnas// kha cig/
8b7(mdo sde): dpa' 'gro'i ting 'dzin thob// kha cig shes rab mig dang ldan// kha cig mi skye bzod la gnas// de kun 'dren pas byin gyis brlabs// bcom ldan gzi brjid chen po'i mthus// bdud kyi 'khor rnams bcom
9a1(mdo sde): @#/ nas su// rnam pa dgu bcu rtsa lnga yi// mu stegs can gyi ris kun btul// sems can dmyal ba byol song dang // yi dgas lha min rgyud kun bcom// de bas sems can bden pa rnams// thams
9a2(mdo sde): cad rgyal ba'i spyan sngar lhags/ / nad dang mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang // mu ges 'jigs pa'ang deng 'dir bcil// sems can mdongs shing 'thom pa dang // yang dag lam ni stor ba bsgral// nyon mongs myos shing 'khrugs
9a3(mdo sde): pa dag/ thams cad zhi ba'i lam la bkod// bdag gis bya ba kun spangs te// lhags nas bcom ldan zhabs la thug/ dpag med pa yi zhing rnams na// bcom ldan da ltar bzhugs pa'i rnams// thams cad khyod la kun
9a4(mdo sde): bsngags pas/ / thos nas thams cad 'di ru lhags// thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho yi// yang dag yon tan tshad ma mchis// sems can mang po'i don mdzad pa// mos pa'i sems kyis phyag 'tshal lo// tshad mad
9a5(mdo sde): bsod nams rdzogs bgyis pas/ / bcom ldan zhabs la phyag 'tshal gyur// tshad med bskal pa'i bar du yang // mchod pa mang pos mchod par shog/ bdag kyang bcom ldan ji bzhin du// de lta bu yi yid dam bcas//
9a6(mdo sde): rnyog pa can gyi 'jig rten 'dir// bla med byang chub thob par shog/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos tshigs su bcad pa dam pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
9a7(mdo sde): stong nas/ 'khor dang bcas te gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi bsung dang / me tog dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rin po che'i rgyan tshad med pa snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor nas/ steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdug
9b1(mdo sde): su gyur te/ dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ci yang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying
9b2(mdo sde): po mthong nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ so so'i nas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lha rdzas kyi spos dang / me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / na bza' dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs la sogs pa phul te/ byang
9b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces smras so/ / bdag gis rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mngon sum du skyes bu chen po khyod mthong nas/
9b4(mdo sde): bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas par gyur to zhes smra'o// de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs par the tshom 'dri zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa las
9b5(mdo sde): langs nas/ gos tshags bcos te phrag pa g.yas pa phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo
9b6(mdo sde): sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'di gang nas mchis/ gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de 'di nas ji srid cig na mchis/ yon tan dang dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam zhig dang
9b7(mdo sde): ldan na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsngags la/ phyir yang bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par bstod par gyur/ bdag cag gis sngon ma mthong bas ngo mtshar
10a1(mdo sde): #du gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu thong zhig/ skyes bu chen po 'di'i yon tan dang dge ba'i rtsi ba jitshim pa de 'jig
10a2(mdo sde): rten du bcas pa/ lha dang mi'i 'khor thams cad kyis rtogs par nus pa ma yin no// gal te de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu chen po de'i yon tan dang dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par bshad na/ 'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang mi thams
10a3(mdo sde): cad kyi mgo rmongs te yid mi ches par 'gyur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rigs par the tsom 'dri bas yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gsol// bcom ldan
10a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ngas khyed la phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o// 'di ltar skyes bu chen po de'i yon tan gyi khyad par tshad med bsam
10a5(mdo sde): gyi mi khyab pa dang ldan no/ / 'di lta ste/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par la bde bar gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul yang shin tu rtogs pas 'jug pa'o// mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i khyad
10a6(mdo sde): par yang thob pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang du gyur pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sa la bzod pa thob pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// seng ge rab tu
10a7(mdo sde): bsgyings pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ting nge 'dzin la yang shin tu gnas pa'o/ / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi ri la yang rab tu 'dzegs pa'o// mu stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu choms pa ste/ sems can
10b1(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa thams cad du de gnas par byed do// skyes bu chen po de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du gnas te/ gang ting nge 'dzin
10b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis tshad med pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par skyed par gyur pas gdul ba'i sems can tshad med pa dag yongs su smin par byed do/ / skyes bu chen po de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/
10b3(mdo sde): gal te ye shes mngon par bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad 'thun par ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi spyod yul kun mthong ba
10b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / de ji ltar gnas par bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te dpag tu med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus
10b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad ci nus pa bzhin du/ tshad med pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad dam pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod par 'gyur ro// ji ltar gnas pa
10b6(mdo sde): bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ / gal te rnam par dag pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas
10b7(mdo sde): pa'i sems can thams cad kyis 'thun par 'dod pa'i spyod yul gyi nyes pa'i skyon tshad med pa mthong nas sems rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ / de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te khrel
11a1(mdo sde): ba dang ngo tsha ba dang ldan pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad lhag pa'i 'dzem pa dang / ngo tsha ba dang /
11a2(mdo sde): ldan zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos dang yongs su bral nas/ bsam pa mi nyams par 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyi kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te theg pa thams cad dang ldan pa gsal ba zhes bya
11a3(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad thabs mkhas pa'i 'phrul gyi mig gi mngon par shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /
11a4(mdo sde): 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba mngon par shes pa dang / 'jig rten 'di dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyi rgyu dang 'bras bu mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur
11a5(mdo sde): te/ gal te mya ngan med pa'i mngon par shes pas rig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad mya ngan dang / yi
11a6(mdo sde): mug pa dang / rmugs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te mngon par shes pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/
11a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad thabs mkhas pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te 'jig rten
11b1(mdo sde): kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mun pa dang bral te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa thams cad kyang phyogs
11b2(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
11b3(mdo sde): zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad log par lta ba yongs su spangs nas/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du
11b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te rdo rje 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi ri khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang /
11b5(mdo sde): ri rab lhun po dang / de ma yin pa'i ri gzhan dang / lung pa dang / lung phran dang / gcong rong dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo dang / tsher ma dang / rtswa dang / shing ngan pa thams cad mi snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na
11b6(mdo sde): ji tsam du ngan par gdags pa dug dang / byad stems dang / gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang / ya 'grog dang / glo bur dang / rims nad dang / yul ngan dang / nam rmus pa dang / rdul dang / dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba'i
11b7(mdo sde): nyal nyil thams cad kyang zhi zhing med par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sa gzhi yang lag mthil bzhin du mnyam zhing bkra shis pa rnam pa sna tshogs rang 'byung ba dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang / phul du 'gyur
12a1(mdo sde): ba dang / dam par 'gyur ba dang / mtshan ma bzang po du mas yongs su brgyan par 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te ye shes kyi/
12a2(mdo sde): stobs gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i bdud kyi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas te thams cad 'jigs skrag nas/ dkon mchog
12a3(mdo sde): gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te glog gi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge
12a4(mdo sde): 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'jigs pa dang bral zhing / chos kyis spro bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing
12a5(mdo sde): rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te mchog dam pa'i ro dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bsams pa
12a6(mdo sde): bzhin du zas dang skom gyis tshim par 'gyur ro/ / de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te mchog gi mdangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge
12a7(mdo sde): 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad gang yang lhag pa'i mthu stobs dang mi ldan pa med de/ nad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs/
12b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te mchog dam pa'i yo byad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad ci
12b2(mdo sde): la mos pa bzhin du khri stan dang / gding ba dang / gos dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / ji tsam gyi 'tsho ba'i yo byad du gtogs pa de dag thams cad kyis brel cing phongs pa med de/ rab tu mdzes pa shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang
12b3(mdo sde): ldan par 'gyur ro/ / de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te rtsod pa med pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus
12b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad lus dang sems zo mdog bde zhing yang ba dang / dgra sdang ba dang 'chi ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / 'dum zhing dga' ba dang / spro ba dang
12b5(mdo sde): sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sems mi 'khrug pa dang / shes rab yongs su rdzogs pa la dga' zhing mos par 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin
12b6(mdo sde): du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te phul du gyur pa'i spro pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i
12b7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad khyad par can gyi rab tu dga' ba tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi
13a1(mdo sde): 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes thob cing rnam par/
13a2(mdo sde): dag pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs sbyong bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te rgyal ba'i rdo rje la shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
13a3(mdo sde): par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad dbang po kun dang ldan zhing / dbang po ma nyams pa dang / rtag tu yang dag par 'byung ba byung ba'i lam la mos
13a4(mdo sde): shing sems rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te lhag pa'i rgyal mtshan rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting
13a5(mdo sde): nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bdag sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos la shin tu skyo zhing mi 'dod pa dang / thams cad kyang dge ba bsrung ba dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
13a6(mdo sde): gyis mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te byams pa dang / snying rjer ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
13a7(mdo sde): na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / gnod pa'am 'tshe ba med pa'i sems dang / kun la snyoms
13b1(mdo sde): pa'i sems dang / gcig la gcig phan pa dang bde bar byed pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro// de ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gal te bsod nams thams cad shin tu
13b2(mdo sde): sdud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / nang dang / mu ge dang yongs su
13b3(mdo sde): bral te/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char pa dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i reg bya'i yul yid du mi 'ong ba thams cad yongs su zhi bar 'gyur ro// de ltar skyes bu chen po de gal te
13b4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho glog 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na/ ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sa chen po thams cad rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas par 'gyur zhing nyes pa'i skyon thams cad
13b5(mdo sde): dang yongs su bral te/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rin po che'i shing dang / gos kyi shing dang / snod kyi shing dang / rgyan gyi shing dang / me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / rol mo sna tshogs kyi shing la sogs
13b6(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad dam pa tshad med pa snyed kyis yongs su brgyan par gyur ro// de bzhin du mdor na rigs kyi bu de ni sems can mang po yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ nyin re zhing snga dro'i dus su ting nge 'dzin gang+gA'i
13b7(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug ste/ ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun na gdul ba'i sems can thams cad la ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhin du phan pa
14a1(mdo sde): dang bde ba'i don de dang de dag gis yongs su smin par byed do/ / rigs kyi bu 'di ni sngon bskal pa chen po tshang mang dpag tu med pa'i bar du rnyog pa lnga'i che/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs
14a2(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ / phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus su 'jig rten gyi khams la lar gal te mtshon gyis 'jigs pa byung ste/ sems can dag yongs su gdungs par gyur pa na/ rigs
14a3(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di de lta bu dag mthong nas/ snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mthus mtshon gyis 'jigs pa de dag yongs su bcil nas/ sems can rnams gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems kyis snying brtse bar byed do//
14a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams la lar nad kyis 'jigs pa byung ste/ sems can kha 'dag pa na rigs kyi bu 'dis de lta bu dag mthong nas/ snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mthus nad kyis 'jigs pa yongs su bcil nas/ sems
14a5(mdo sde): can rnams rab tu bde ba thob par byed do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams la lar gal te mu ges 'jigs pa 'byung ste/ sems can kha 'dag pa na rigs kyi bu 'dis de lta bu dag mthong nas/ snga dro'i dus kyis tshe ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus
14a6(mdo sde): mu ge'i 'jigs pa yongs su bcil te/ sems can rnams kha zas kyis tshim par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'dis de ltar ting nge 'dzin mang po'i shugs kyis de lta bu la sogs pa tshad med dpag tu med bsam gyis mi
14a7(mdo sde): khyab pa'i phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyis sems can gyi dbugs 'byin to/ / rigs kyi bu 'di ni de ltar nan tan gyi khyad par tshad med grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad la
14b1(mdo sde): phan pa dang bde bar byed pa'i don la rab tu brtson pa'o/ / sngon 'das pa'i dus na skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tsha med bye ma/
14b2(mdo sde): snyed las zad mi shes pa'i yid dam chen po bcas te/ snying rje chen po dang mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus chen po rab tu bskyed do// de ltar snying rje chen po dang mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus bskyed de/ zad mi shes pa'i yi dam
14b3(mdo sde): bcas pas/ gong nas gong du 'phags pa'i shugs kyis nyin zhag gcig gam/ skad cig thang cig tsam gyis kyang so so'i skye bo tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig btul te/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs las bsgral nas thams cad
14b4(mdo sde): ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag gis re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / gnas gang dag 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal te/ 'dod pas yongs su gdungs par gyur pa dag sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems
14b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ ci dang ci 'dod pa thams cad 'thob cing sdug bsngal dang bral te/ skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du
14b6(mdo sde): mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang bza' ba dang btung bas 'phongs par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa'
14b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/ ci dang ci 'dod pa thams cad 'thob cing / bza' ba dang btung ba dang ldan te/ mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/
15a1(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang bgo ba 'am/ rin po che'i rgyan nam/ nad kyi rkyen sman nam/ gding ba 'am/ khri 'am/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad
15a2(mdo sde): kyis brel cing 'phongs par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ ci dang ci 'dod/
15a3(mdo sde): pa rnyed cing bgo ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / gding ba dang / khri dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad 'byor cing / skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da'
15a4(mdo sde): ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag byams sdug pa dang bral te/ dgra sdang ba dang phrad par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i
15a5(mdo sde): snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/ byams sdug pa dang phrad cing / dgra sdang ba dang bral te/ skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da'
15a6(mdo sde): ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag lus dang sems nad dang sdug bsngal mang pos gzir bar gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
15a7(mdo sde): sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun lus dang sems bde zhing nad thams cad dang bral te/ skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya
15b1(mdo sde): ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / gnas gang dag na sems can gang 'thab cing rtsod par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas
15b2(mdo sde): brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/ zhe 'gras pa'i sems dang bral te/ gcig la gcig dga' ba dang / bzod pa dang / gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems kyis 'gyod cing 'chags par
15b3(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang btson du bzung ste/ btson rar bcug gam/ lcags dang / khong sgril
15b4(mdo sde): dang / shing gi gdos kyis bcings sam/ yan lag bcings te sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti
15b5(mdo sde): stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun btson ra dang / lcags dang / khong sgril dang / lcags sgrog las thar te bag yongs su gyur nas dga' ba dang / skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/
15b6(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag btson du bzung nas gzhu ba 'am/ 'tshog pa 'am/ nan la bar ba dang / gsad pa la thug pa dag gis sems rtse gcig/
15b7(mdo sde): tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun btson du bzung ba dang / gzhu btsog pa dang / nan la bor ba las thams
16a1(mdo sde): cad thar te/ skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag lus dang sems dub pa dang // mthu
16a2(mdo sde): stobs dang mi ldan zhing nyam chung ba dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun lus
16a3(mdo sde): dang sems yang zhing bde ba dang mthu stobs skyes te/ cis 'dul ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dbang po nyams pa dang na
16a4(mdo sde): tshang bar gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun dbang po ma tshang ba med cing
16a5(mdo sde): dbang po dang ldan te/ skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag smos shing sems 'khrugs sam/ 'byung po'i gdon
16a6(mdo sde): gyis brlams pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/ de kun smros shing 'khrugs pa dang
16a7(mdo sde): bral te/ rab tu bde ba dang skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
16b1(mdo sde): dang / khong khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal dang / ngan par lta ba dang / gnyid dang / bag med pa dang / the tsom la sogs pas lus dang sems gdungs te/ mi bde bar gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub
16b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/ de kun 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral te/ lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / skal ba
16b3(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag mes tshig par gyur pa 'am/ chus khyer ba 'am/ rlung gis khyer ba 'am
16b4(mdo sde): rbab tu ltung ba 'am/ shing ka 'am/ khang thog nas lhung te/ sems dngas shing 'kham par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing
16b5(mdo sde): dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun mi bde ba'i bgegs dang g.yang sa de dag thams cad las thar te/ skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob/
16b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag sbrul gdug pa 'am/ gcan zan gdug pas zin tam/ dug rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phog par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
16b7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun 'tshe zhing gnod pa thams cad dang bral te/ skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan
17a1(mdo sde): las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / gnas gang dag na sems can gang 'byung po'i gdon gyis btab ste/ rtag pa'i rims dang / zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa
17a2(mdo sde): dang / zhag bzhi pa dang / smos nas lus dang sems 'dar zhing 'khrugs te/ dran pa nyams shing shes pa med par gyur pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod
17a3(mdo sde): cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod pa byas na/ de kun 'jigs pa las rnam par grol te/ lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas
17a4(mdo sde): gang dag na sems can gang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / grul bum dang / mdangs za ba dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang seng ge dang / stag dang / spyang ki la
17a5(mdo sde): sogs pa gcan gzan gdug pas nyen pa dang / sngags dang / byang dang / g.yul ngor lhags pa dang / gzhan yang 'jigs par gyur pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dkris shing rlags te/ lus dang sems rab tu dngangs par gyur nas/
17a6(mdo sde): shi bas 'jigs shing 'tsho bar 'dod pa dang / bde ba tshol zhing sdug bsngal mi 'dod pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang
17a7(mdo sde): dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/ de kun 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te/ lus dang srog la mi dma' ba dang / skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro//
17b1(mdo sde): gnas gang dag na sems can gang mang du thos par 'dod pa 'am/ mos pa dag par 'dod pa 'am/ tshul khrims dag par 'dod pa 'am/ bsam gtan bsgrub par 'dod pa'am/ mngon par shes pa 'dod pa 'am/ shes
17b2(mdo sde): rab 'dod pa 'am/ rnam par grol ba 'dod pa 'am/ gzugs dam pa 'dod pa 'am/ sgra snyan pa 'dod pa 'am/ dri zhim po 'dod pa 'am/ ro zhim po 'dod pa 'am/ reg bya mchog 'dod pa 'am/ khe dang rnyed pa
17b3(mdo sde): 'dod pa 'am/ grags pa 'dod pa 'am/ bsod nams 'dod pa 'am/ bzos 'tsho bar 'dod pa 'am/ me tog dang 'bras bu 'dod pa 'am/ skyed mos tshal 'dod pa 'am/ khri stan 'dod pa 'am/ gding ba 'dod
17b4(mdo sde): pa'am/ yul rgyu bar 'dod pa 'am/ nor dang 'bru 'dod pa 'am/ nad kyi rkyen sman 'dod pa 'am/ khang khyim 'dod pa 'am/ bran khol 'dod pa 'am/ tshon rtsi 'dod pa 'am/ char pa 'dod pa 'am/ chu 'dod pa
17b5(mdo sde): 'am/ lo tog 'dod pa 'am/ bsil yab 'dod pa 'am/ rlung bsil ba 'dod pa 'am/ me 'dod pa 'am/ theg pa 'dod pa 'am/ bu pho dang bu mo 'dod pa 'am/ thabs mkhas par 'dod pa 'am/ bsod nams bya bar
17b6(mdo sde): 'dod pa 'am/ dro bar 'dod pa 'am/ bsil bar 'dod pa 'am/ yid gzhungs par 'dod pa 'am/ de ma yin pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don gyi dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod pa'i phyir/ nyon mong
17b7(mdo sde): shing sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par 'gyur ba dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/ rigs kyi
18a1(mdo sde): @#/ / bu de'i ting nge 'dzin dam pa'i yon tan dablag mi brjid kyi shugs kyis de dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa dang bral te/ re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas/ skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho raH/
18a2(mdo sde): kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag zhing gshin pa 'am/ zhing mi gshin pa la sa bon btab nas/ gal te nan tan byas kyang rung / nan tan ma byas kyang
18a3(mdo sde): rung ste/ sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu de'i ting nge 'dzin dam pa'i yon tan dang /
18a4(mdo sde): mthu dang / gzi brjid kyi shugs kyis de dag gis lo tog thams cad legs shing 'bras bu smin cing legs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni sngon bskal pa chen po tshad med grangs med
18a5(mdo sde): pa'i bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa dag la brtson 'grus chen po'i sbyor ba dang / brtan pa'i yi dam bcas pa'i smon lam gyi dbang gis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ rtag tu sa
18a6(mdo sde): chen po thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rtag tu sa bon gyi tshogs thams cad yongs su 'dzin cing / rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi yid bzhin spyod par byed do// rigs kyi bu de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus sa chen po 'di las
18a7(mdo sde): skye ba'i rtsa dang / shing gi rtsa ba dang / yal ga dang / myu gu dang / lo ma dang / sdong po dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa thams cad rgyas par skye zhing / rtsi shing dang / lo tog la sogs pa'i me
18b1(mdo sde): tog dang 'bras bu yang smin cing grung ba dang / dang ra ba dang / snum pa dang / dri zhim par byed do// gnas gang dag na sems can gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa drag la rno bas srog gcod pa
18b2(mdo sde): dang ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / ngag rtsub por smra ba dang / phra ma byed pa dang / tshig bkyal par smra ba dang / 'dod chags can dang / zhe sdang can dang
18b3(mdo sde): log par lta ba dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mngon du spyod pa dag gis sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te/
18b4(mdo sde): mchod pa byas na/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi zhing mi dge ba bcu dang yongs su bral te/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing / sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje ba dang / phan pa dang
18b5(mdo sde): bde ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de ltar rigs kyi bu 'di ni de lta bu'i yon tan dam pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mthu dang / gzi brjid kyi shugs dang / shin tu brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis skad cig thang
18b6(mdo sde): cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med par phyin cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de re rer yang skad cig gis sems can snod du gyur pa tshad med grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed sdug bsngal las bsgral nas
18b7(mdo sde): bde ba thob par byas te/ skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// de ltar rigs kyi bu de ni de lta bu'i yon tan dang / smon lam brtan pa
19a1(mdo sde): dang / shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan te/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su kha cig la ni tshangs
19a2(mdo sde): pa chen po'i rgyal po'i lus su ston te/ sems can rnams cis 'dul ba'i chos ston to// kha cig la ni dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gnas
19a3(mdo sde): kyi lha'i lus su ston to/ / kha cig la ni 'phrul dga' gnam gyi lha'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni dga' ldan gnam gyi lha'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni rab mtshe ma gnam gyi lha'i lus su ston to// kha cig
19a4(mdo sde): la ni sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha'i lus su ston to/ / kha cig la ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni sangs rgyas kyi skur ston to// kha cig la ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus su ston to//
19a5(mdo sde): kha cig la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi lus su ston to// kha cig la ni nyan thos kyi lus su ston to// kha cig la ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni rgyal rigs kyi lus su ston to// kha cig
19a6(mdo sde): la ni bram ze'i rigs kyi lus su ston to/ / kha cig la ni dmangs rigs kyi lus su ston to// kha cig la ni rje'u rigs kyi lus su ston to// kha cig la ni skyes pa'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni bud med kyi
19a7(mdo sde): lus su ston to/ / kha cig la ni gzhon nu'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni bu mo'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni dri za'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni lha ma yin gyi lus su ston to// kha cig la ni mi 'am ci'i lus
19b1(mdo sde): su ston to/ / kha cig la ni lto 'phye chen po'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni klu'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni gnod sbyin gyi lus su ston to// kha cig la ni srin po'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni grul bum gyi lus/
19b2(mdo sde): su ston to// kha cig la ni sha za'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni yi dgas kyi lus su ston to// kha cig la ni srul po'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni lus srul po'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni gnon
19b3(mdo sde): po'i lus su ston to/ / kha cig la ni seng ge'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni spos kyi ba glang gi lus su ston to// kha cig la ni rta'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni khyu mchog gi lus su ston to// kha cig
19b4(mdo sde): la ni gcan gzan sna tshogs kyi lus su ston to/ / kha cig la ni gshin rje'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma'i lus su ston to// kha cig la ni sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can gyi lus
19b5(mdo sde): su ston to/ / de dag la sogs pa tshad med grangs med pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lus su ston to// skye bo mang po skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa'i/ theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'dzud do// rigs
19b6(mdo sde): kyi bu skyes bu chen po de ni de ltar de lta bu'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par dang ldan te/ de ni yon tan mchog tu gyur pa/ phul du gyur pa'i gter yin no// rnam par grol ba'i rin po che thams cad 'byung
19b7(mdo sde): ba'i 'byung gnas yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i mig yongs su dag pa yin no// mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer chen por 'gro ba'i ded dpon yin no// de ltar ched du ma byas par gong du rgyas par bshad
20a1(mdo sde): pa'i yon tan chen pos chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rab tu bskor ba yin no/ / 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu gal te 'ga' zhig gis byams pa 'am/ 'jam dpal lam/ kun tu
20a2(mdo sde): spyan ras gzigs sam/ kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la/ bskal pa brgya'i bar du sems rtse gcig tu skabs su song nas/ de dag gi mtshan nas
20a3(mdo sde): brjod cing dmigs pas bsti stang dang bcas te mchod cing / phyag 'tshal ba dang / 'dod pa re ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa bas/ 'ga' zhig gis skad cig thang cig yud tsam sems rtse gcig tu/ byang chub sems
20a4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas mchod pa dang phyag byas na/ re ba'i smon lam thams cad myur du 'grub cing rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
20a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po 'di sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ sems can rnams kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/ dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gter dang /
20a6(mdo sde): 'dra'o// de ltar skyes bu chen po 'di ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ yun ring po nas smon lam chen po shin tu brtan pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus bsgoms pa'i phyir//
20a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' kun pas 'phags pa yin pas/ khyed kyis bsti stang dang bcas pas mchod par bya'o// de nas phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /
20b1(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / lha dang / mi dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za la sogs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'dug pa las langs nas/ ci nus su so so nas gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog
20b2(mdo sde): dang spos kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la mchod pa'i phyir mngon par gtor to/ / de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / nor bu dang / nor bu rin po che dang / mu tig gi 'phreng
20b3(mdo sde): ba dang / mu tig gi se mo do dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che'i 'phreng ba dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs la sogs pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po
20b4(mdo sde): la mchod pa'i phyir phul lo/ / gzhan yang tshad med pa'i lha rdzas kyi rol mo snyan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i bstod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la bsti stang dang
20b5(mdo sde): bcas pas mchod pa byas so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa'i yo byad de dag slar bcom ldan 'das la phul nas tshigs su bcad pa
20b6(mdo sde): 'a'adi dag smras so/ / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin mi rnams dang / phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i mchod pa rnams// yon tan chen po 'jig rten gcol 'bul// mchog gi mchod pa 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ de na
20b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos tshigs su bcad pa de smras nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab la spyi bos phyag 'tshal ba dang / de la bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
21a1(mdo sde): brtan pa'i blo dang rnam dag sems bskyed nas// sems can tshad med pa yi sdug bsngal bcil// rin chen dag ltar kun la bde bar mthong // rdo rje bzhin du the
21a2(mdo sde): tsom dra ba gcod/ / snying rje chen po'i blo can brtson 'grus kyis// mchod pa dam pa bcom ldan 'das la 'bul// rgya mtsho'i ye shes sems can sdug bsngal sgrol// 'jigs pa med pas sred
21a3(mdo sde): pa'i pha rol phyin/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po 'dug pa las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
21a4(mdo sde): 'das bdag gis chu bo bzhi las sgrol ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyi nye gnas dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa dran pa 'phel ba dang / bsrung ba'i
21a5(mdo sde): dran pa 'phel ba dang / 'tsho ba 'phel ba dang / lus bde ba 'phel ba dang / nad ma mchis pa 'phel ba dang / gzugs dang stobs 'phel ba dang / grags pa 'phel ba dang / 'tsho ba'i
21a6(mdo sde): byad 'phel ba dang / gnyen bshes 'phel ba dang / slob ma 'phel ba dang / tshul khrims 'phel ba dang / mang du thos pa 'phel ba dang / sbyin pa 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'phel ba dang
21a7(mdo sde): bzod pa 'phel ba dang / thabs mkhas pa 'phel ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dag dang 'phags pa'i bden pa 'phel ba dang / theg pa chen po'i yang dag pa'i lam la gzhol ba 'phel ba dang /
21b1(mdo sde): chos kyi sgron ma baphel ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba 'bel ba dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po 'phel ba dang / rnam par dkar ba'i chos 'phel ba dang /
21b2(mdo sde): khams gsum du grags pa 'phel pa dang / khams gsum du chos kyi char 'phel ba dang / sa chen po thams cad kyi ro bro ba 'phel ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mdangs dang dge ba'i
21b3(mdo sde): las 'phel ba dang / chos kyi dga' ba dang dge ba'i spyod pa 'phel ba dang / shes rab kyi 'od 'phel ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug 'phel ba dang / spyan snga 'phel ba dang / dbang
21b4(mdo sde): bskur ba 'thob pa dang / lhar skye ba dang mya ngan las 'da' ba 'phel ba la sogs pa thob par byed pa nas/ 'di lta ste/ me dang chur ldan pa dang / bkra shis 'od snang dang / thos pa
21b5(mdo sde): 'dzin pa'i rig sngags chen po dang / gzungs kyi tshig 'di bdag gis 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas gzungs 'di thos te/ gzungs
21b6(mdo sde): 'dis ni rnam par dkar ba'i chos thams cad 'phel zhing skye ba dang / sa bon gyi tshogs dang / rtsa ba dang / myu gu dang / yal ga dang / sdong po dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang
21b7(mdo sde): me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / rtsi shing dang / lo tog gi bro ba dang bsung 'phel zhing skye ba dang / char chu dang ldan pa dang / phan par 'gyur ba'i sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung 'phel zhing
22a1(mdo sde): / skye ba dang / dga' ba dang / bde ba 'phel zhing skye ba dang / rin po che dang nor rdzas 'phel zhing skye ba dang / mthu stobs 'phel zhing skye ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams
22a2(mdo sde): cad 'bel zhing skye bar 'gyur ro/ / gang gzungs 'dis ni shes rab skye bas nyon mongs pa'i dgra yang yongs su bcom par 'gyur ba'i sngags la/ 'di lta ste/ tshim b+h+yo/ tshim b+h+yo/ tshim
22a3(mdo sde): b+ho/ A kA sha tshim b+h+yo/ bkar tshim b+h+yo/ a ma pra tshim b+ho/ bar tshim b+ho/ bi tsar tshim D+ho/ a ro ga tshim b+ho/ d+harma tshi me b+ho/ sa de ba tshis b+ho/ sa ti ni hal tshim b+ho/ bi ba
22a4(mdo sde): ro ka sha ba tshim g+ho/ u pa sha ma tshim b+ho/ na yan tshom b+ho/ pradz+nyA sam mo ni rang na mchim b+ho/ kra na tshom b+ho/ bi she ma ba ri yA tshim b+ho/ shA sr-i
22a5(mdo sde): lam b+ha tshim b+ho/ bi a d+hA so tra ma he le/ dam be lam pa/ tsa kA se/ tsak+kA ba si le krI le/ bi le/ kar b+ha bA ra/ ba rI te ha se re ba ra be/ pa re tsa rA/ ban dA ne/ a ra drA ne/ bA na
22a6(mdo sde): rA/ tsa tsa/ hi le mi le/ a kha ta thA ga khe/ thug l+le 'o/ b+h+re d+hA r+ye/ mi lem de/ nan te/ gu le mi le/ yang ga tsi d+he/ sU d+hir/ bar phyir/ bta sham ma
22a7(mdo sde): nyon gyi nyon gyi/ ton gru le/ su ruH/ hraH/ gu lo sta ma le/ mo 'i nyi ma te/ bra ta/ bar kha ma re/ sarba / srid pa'i drim spong ba dge bar gsungs// bzab rtson
22b1(mdo sde): bskal pa zhi ba'ang dge bar gsungs/ / mi dge bsam pa sbyong ba dge bar gsungs// 'byung ba chen po sbyong ba'ang dge bar gsungs// ngan par 'gro ba sbyong ba'ang dge bar gsungs//
22b2(mdo sde): sdig pa'i bag chags sbyong ba'ang dge bar gsungs// re ba rdzogs par byed pa'ang dge bar gsungs// lo tog smin par byed pa'ang dge bar gsungs// sangs rgyas kun gyis dge bar
22b3(mdo sde): gsungs pa 'di/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis byin brlabs pa// dge bar gsungs 'dis byang chub sems dpa' rnams// byin gyis rlob mdzad rjes su yi rang ngo // bcom
22b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das de ltar me dang chu dang ldan pa dang / bkra shis kyi 'od snang ba dang / thos pa 'dzin pa'i rig sngags chen po gzungs kyi tshig 'di ni bdag gis 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
22b5(mdo sde): chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur bgyis pas thos so/ / gzungs 'di ni rnam par dkar ba'i chos thams cad 'phel zhing skye bar bgyid pa nas/ de bzhin du rgyas pa'i longs spyod pa'i yo byad
22b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bar du 'phel zhing skye bar bgyid do/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'dis ni chu bo bzhi las sgrol bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyi nye gnas su gyur pa dge slong dang / dge slong ma
22b7(mdo sde): dang dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa'i dmigs pa 'phel bar bgyid pa nas/ de bzhin du rgyas par 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi bar du 'phel zhing skye bar bgyid do// gzungs 'di ni bcom
23a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi 'dags pa'i gsung rab bdud ni stsu su 'ongs su rgyas pa dang / dran du gnas shing 'ams gnam gyi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i donas sgyu 'o/
23a2(mdo sde): / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos thos pa 'dzin pa'i rig sngags chen po dang / gzungs kyi tshig 'di smras pa na/ ri khal te la rab tu g.yos nas/ lha'i rol mo bye
23a3(mdo sde): khrag khrig kyang ma dkrol bar rang 'khrol te/ lha'i spos dang / me tog dang / rin po che tshad med pa sna tshogs char bzhin du babs nas/ de'i tshe 'khor mang po thams cad kyang ngo mtshar rmad du gyur to//
23a4(mdo sde): de'i tshe na 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na lha mo bkra shis chen mo dang / dpal ldan lha mo chen mo dang / mchod dbyangs lha mo chen mo dang / brtan pa lha mo chen mo dang / chu can lha mo chen mo dang / 'od
23a5(mdo sde): chen lha mo chen mo la sogs pa/ lha mo 'byung ba chen po bzhi la dbang du gyur pa stong phrag bco brgyad 'dug pa las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas
23a6(mdo sde): bsti stang dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che'o// bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag gis 'byung ba chen po
23a7(mdo sde): bzhi dag la dbang sgyur mod kyi/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / 'thun pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs mi 'tshal te/ skyes bu chen po
23b1(mdo sde): 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phra ba shin tu zab mo thob pas 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i mtshan nyid dang / skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / 'thun pa dang
23b2(mdo sde): mi mthun pa'i phyogs la shin du mkhas so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phra ba shin tu
23b3(mdo sde): zab mo thob pas/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i mtshan nyid skye ba dang / bkag pa dang / 'thun pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la shin tu mkhas so// lha mo 'di ltar
23b4(mdo sde): shes par bya'o/ / 'di lta ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni yon tan mang po dang ldan pas/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'bab ste/ sems can mang po la sbyin pa byed/
23b5(mdo sde): do// rigs kyi bu 'di yang de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du 'debs te/ sems can la sbyin par byed do// 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i gling ltar rin po
23b6(mdo sde): chetshe rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'di yang byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang / 'di lta ste/ lha rdzas kyi shing pa ri dzi tra la bsung dang me tog gis
23b7(mdo sde): mdzes pa bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu mdzes so// 'di lta ste/ seng ge'i rgyal po ni ri dgas thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non cing mi skrag pa
24a1(mdo sde): / bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'di yang sems can thams cad kyis bag tsha ba 'am/ zil gyis non pa med do// 'di lta ste/ ji ltar nyi ma gsal bas 'jig rten gyi mun pa thams
24a2(mdo sde): cad yongs su sel ba bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'di yang sems can thams cad kyi ngan par lta ba'i ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel to// 'di lta ste/ gnam thang ba'i zla ba ni mtshan mo'i dus su lam stor ba'i
24a3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la bde ba'i lam ston to/ / gar 'gro bar dga' bzhin du phyin par 'gyur ba ltar/ rigs kyi bu 'di yang ma rig pa'i mtshan mor theg pa gsum las 'brog bslad de/ 'khor ba'i 'brog
24a4(mdo sde): dgon par 'khyam pa'i sems can thams cad la theg pa gsum gyis yang dag pa'i lam ston cing / skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du thabs kyis yang dag par 'byung ba byung ba'i lam la 'god par byed do//
24a5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sa chen po la ni sa bon gyi tshogs thams cad dang / rtsi shing dang / lo tog dang / sa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba ltar/ rigs kyi bu 'di la yang byang chub
24a6(mdo sde): kyi yan lag khyad par can gyi chos thams cad rton pa'i gnas so/ / 'di lta ste/ rin po che chen po ri rab ri'i rgyal po ni shin tu brtan zhing ma god ma nyams pa bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'di yang sangs rgyas
24a7(mdo sde): kyi ma 'dres pa'i chos thams cad la shin tu gnas shing / sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i phyir mi nyams pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gtong ba'i phyir ma god pa'o// 'di lta ste/
24b1(mdo sde): nam mkha' la sems can thams cad spyod pa bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'di yang sems can thams cad de la longs spyod do// rigs kyi bu 'di ni de ltar yon tan tshad med dpag du med pa dang ldan no//
24b2(mdo sde): de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa stong pa thos nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ bkur sti dang rim gro
24b3(mdo sde): byas nas rab tu dga' bas sems rtse gcig du byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la mig mi 'dzums par lta'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de
24b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu yang dag sa yi snying po ni// yon tan mang po phun sum tshogs par ldan// dge sbyong cha lugs 'dzin cing ston byed pa// ston pa chen po la ni phyag 'tshal lhags// sems can kun la
24b5(mdo sde): bde ba rab tu byin/ / srid pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal kun las sgrol// tshad med rnam pa sna tshogs char phab nas// ston pa chen po la ni mchod pa byed// brgya byir dri ma med par skyes pa des// phyogs bzhi
24b6(mdo sde): kun tu bltas shing brtags nas su/ / thal mo sbyar nas bsti stang rab bcas te// ston pa chen po la ni bsngags shing bstod// bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor mthong ba// nor bu rin po che yi 'od
24b7(mdo sde): zer ltar/ / sangs rgyas mang po'i zhing kun snang byas te// thams cad gsal bar ma gyur gang yang med// mngon shes drug gis 'jig rten snang bar byed// deng 'dir 'dus shing lhags par 'gyur ba ni/
25a1(mdo sde): shin tu dpa' bas kyi snying po ste// rab tu 'byung ba'i spyod lam mngon par stod// 'phags pa'i nor bdun 'byung ba'i gter yin te// 'jigs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas nga ro/
25a2(mdo sde): dbyangs// byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i rgyal mtshan de// sems can mang po 'dren pa'i gtso bo'o// rnam par grol ba'i rin chen 'byung khung ste// brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsod
25a3(mdo sde): nams rgya mtsho yin/ / byams pa'i blo gros snying rje brtse la mos// sdug bsngal ba yi sems can mang po sgrol// 'jigs pa bsrung ba'i ngobs dang mkhar yin te// nam mkha' dang ba'i zla
25a4(mdo sde): bzhin lam yang ston/ / sa ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed// rdo rje ltar ni the tsom yongs su gcod// rnam par grol ba'i rin chen kun la gtong // chu ltar sgrib pa thams cad bdag par byed//
25a5(mdo sde): / nyon mongs tsha bas gdungs pa'i gdugs su 'gyur// sman pa ltar ni nad kun 'tsho bar byed// zhag gtsigs yi snying po'i ming brjod pa'i// grags pa chen po'i bsod nams thob pa ni// bskal pa bye ba khrag
25a6(mdo sde): khrig par du yang / / blo can gzhan gyi ming nas brjod pas lhag/ so mar skye bo zol bar byed pa ni// nyon mongs thams cad rnam par 'ching ba la'o// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin mthar
25a7(mdo sde): phyin cing / / ting 'dzin gzhan dag gi yang pha rol phyin// rkyen mang bcu gsum po yang nam dag pas// mang po kun la ye shes nam mkha' bzhin// dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams
25b1(mdo sde): kyi/ / skye bo mang po'i mun pa'i tshogs kyang bcom// zhing rnams ji bzhin ting 'dzin der 'jug cing // bsam gtan bzhi po la yang rgyun du 'jug/ ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas sems can gyi//
25b2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa yi gdung pa rab tu sel// so so'i skye bo sngon gyi sdig pa'i las// mtshon dang nad dang mu ges 'jigs pa dang / rnam pa mang pos 'tshe zhing gsod gyur pa// de dag kun las
25b3(mdo sde): rnam par grol bar byed/ / sems can nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga// sdug bsngal mang pos 'tshe zhing gdungs gyur pa// sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na// srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad
25b4(mdo sde): zhi bar 'gyur/ / sems can sdug bsngal 'khor los rab bskor te// gcig gis gcig la 'tshe zhing gnod gyur pa// sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na// bzod cing byams pa'i sems la gnas
25b5(mdo sde): par gyur/ / bcu gsum rkyen gyis rab tu 'jigs skrag cing // tshol ba mi rnyed rkyen gyis sdug pa dag/ sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na// 'jigs pa med la bde bar gnas par 'gyur//
25b6(mdo sde): bsod nams byed la mos shing dran pa dang // tshul khrims mang thos shes rab 'dod pa dag/ sau yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na// re ba bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur// yon tan so
25b7(mdo sde): sor smos pa'i bzo rtsal dang / / sman dang sa bon tshogs la mos pa dag/ sa pi snying po de la skyabs gsol na// re ba kun dang ldan zhing rdzogs par 'gyur// lo tog rtsi shing legs par 'dod
26a1(mdo sde): / pa dang // khye'u dang bu mo gos dang bran khol phyir// sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na// re ba bzhin du thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur// yon tan mang po kun dang ldan
26a2(mdo sde): pas na/ / sa chen 'di yang mi gtong rab tu 'dzin// de yi rkyen gyis sman dang lo tog rnams// snum zhing 'jam la ro dang ldan par 'gyur// nyon mongs mang po sgrib par gyur nas su//
26a3(mdo sde): mi dge bcu yi las la mos pa dag/ sa yi snying po de la skyabs gsol na// mi dge nyon mongs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi lus ston cing // skye bo mang po dag la
26a4(mdo sde): chos kyang sngon/ / sbyin pa'i yon tan thams cad rab rdzogs pas// sems cad kun la snying rjes brtse bar gyur// gal te bskal pa mang po brgya yi bar// de yi yon tan bsngags shing rab bstod kyang //
26a5(mdo sde): mthar phyin rdzogs par 'gyur ba shin tu dka'// de bas kun gyi bsti stang bcas pas mchod// 'dus pa chen po las/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste
26a6(mdo sde): dang po'o/ / / 'dus pa chen po las/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po gnyis pa/
26a7(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po stan la lang nas bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
26b1(mdo sde): lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// yon tan tshad med rgya mtsho can// bcom ldan 'das la zhu gsol ba// the tsom nem nur rtsi
26b2(mdo sde): mchis pa/ / bdag la rgyas par bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu yang dag pa khyod ni chos thams cad ye shes kyis mthong ba la thogs pa med de/ 'on kyang sems can la phan
26b3(mdo sde): pa dang bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//
26b4(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma'i snying pos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ de dag sngon bskal pa bcu gsum du// skyed pa dka' ba shin tu sbyang // me me'i skye bo gan dong /
26b5(mdo sde): 'jigs pa gsum dang rnyog lnga bsal// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la// tshad ma mchis pa'i mchod bgyis pas// bsam pa dag pa'i 'khor 'di dang // tshogs chen 'dus pa'ang sngon blong ngo // /
26b6(mdo sde): blo can brtson 'grus rtsol ba dge/ thams cad 'dus shing tshogs 'dir lhags// shin tu skyor med 'khor 'di dag/ mthong bar gyur pa ngo mtshar rmad// ci slad sangs rgyas zhing 'di kun// sdig pas dge
26b7(mdo sde): pa nyams bgyis shing / / blo can dag gis spangs pa yi// ngan par spyod kur lhan cig gnas// mtshams med sdig pa bgyid pa dang // yang dag dam pa'i chos la skur// 'phags pa smod cing log lnga
27a1(mdo sde): bas/ / rtag dang chad pa'i gtsug lag 'chad// sdig pa bcu yi las bgyid cing // 'jig rten phyi mas mi 'jigs pa// theg pa rnam gsum rim spangs shing /
27a2(mdo sde): sdig can ngan 'gro dag la gzhol// ma rig pas ni bgribs pa'i mig/ 'dod chags phrag dog sgyus 'tsho ba// sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab bskor te// sems can 'di dag sgrol bar mdzad// ji ltar
27a3(mdo sde): nying mtshams sbyor ba yi/ / nyon mongs rdo rje lta bu gcad// ji lta bur na gzugs dga' thob// de bzhin bzod pa'ang nges par 'gyur// bdag gis 'dren pa tshogs chen dag/ mthong bar gyur pa ngo ma
27a4(mdo sde): che/ / 'di 'dra'i yon tan kun tshogs pa// phyogs gzhan dag na ma mthong ngo // yon tan mang po kun ldan zhing // byang chub lam la rab brtson pas// ji ltar byis pa'i 'khor dag la// sangs
27a5(mdo sde): rgyas 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs
27a6(mdo sde): rgyas ngag gi zhing na rnyog pa lnga'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed la sngon 'di lta bu'i don dag zhu ba zhus so// khyod kyis dris pa'i don 'di dag la sngon yang nan tan shin tu byas pas/
27a7(mdo sde): shin du rtogs shing khong du chud // spyod pa mang po phun sum tshogs pa pha rol tu phyin pas shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i shes rab dang ldan te/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
27b1(mdo sde): / phan pa dang bde ba'i don thob par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad thabs mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i spyod pa'i gter sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis
27b2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
27b3(mdo sde): rgyal po spyod pa mi dge ba la gnas pa thams cad ngan song gsum las bzlog cing mi ltung bar bya ba dang / zhing 'dir dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung shin du rgyas shing yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di
27b4(mdo sde): lta bu'i don dris pa legs so/ / shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bstan par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la slar nyan to//
27b5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis
27b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu dang ldan te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnyog pa lnga can gyi sems can thams cad rnam par dkar ba'i chos thams cad las phyir ldog pa dang 'phags pa'i nor rin po che bdun
27b7(mdo sde): gyis brel ba dang / mkhas pa dag dang ring du gyur pa chad pa dang rtag pa'i dra bas kun nas klags pa dang / ngan song du 'gro ba'i shing rta la spro zhing dga' ba dang / skye ba phyi ma'i sdug bsngal la 'jigs par ma
28a1(mdo sde): lta ba dang / ma rig pa'i mun nag thibs po la gnas pa la dad pa dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rdzogs par byed pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos
28a2(mdo sde): la skur cing babags pa la dbang za ba/ dge ba'i chos thams cad ring du spong zhing / mi dge ba'i chos rdzogs par byed pa'i gnas na bzhugs so// de lta bu'i sdug sngal rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i
28a3(mdo sde): zhing na bzhugs kyang rab tu bde bar bzhugs te/ bag tsha ba med pa dang / 'jigs skrag pa med pas drang srong chen po'i gnas su phyin te/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ lha dang bdud du
28a4(mdo sde): bcas pa'i mu stegs can log par smra ba thams cad btul nas/ so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi rigs la nyon mongs pa shin tu sra ba rdo rje lta bu dag bsal nas/ ci la mos pa bzhin du so sor bkod
28a5(mdo sde): do/ / mthu dang ldan pa'i sems can dag ni theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog par yang mdzad do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ yul kha cig tu srid med par 'gyur ba na/ de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad
28a6(mdo sde): bdag gis dmag dang gzhan gyi dmag gyis yongs su gtses shing / nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ de na gnas pa'i mi mang po yang mi bde bas 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / gcig la
28a7(mdo sde): gcig smod pa tshad med pa snyed 'byung ste/ brdzun du smra ba dang / g.yo sgyu dang / tshig rtsub por smra ba dang / skur brlang 'debs shing 'khrug pa dang / dmus long dang / ling tog can du 'gyur
28b1(mdo sde): ba dang / nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i nad ma rungs pa dang / rims rnam pa mang po dang / smyo ba dang / skem byed dang / kha zas mi 'ju ba dang / sems
28b2(mdo sde): 'khrug cing myos pa dang / dbang po ma tshang zhing yan lag dang nying lag nyams pa dang / bgo ba dang / bza' ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'phongs shing brel te/ bdog pa thams cad du
28b3(mdo sde): mi 'ong ba dang / skye bo thams cad mu stegs can dang / 'jig rten gyi lha la skyabs su song zhing lta ba ngan pa dang / bsam pa ngan pa dang / mos pa yongs su rgyas te/ yang dag pa'i lam stor nas ngan song du
28b4(mdo sde): ltung bar 'gyur ba na/ de'i tshe yul de na gnas pa'i rgan po blo dang ldan zhing yid gsungs pa mang du thos pa drang dkan pa dag 'dus gros su bgros te/ yul dang grong gi mi kun bsdus nas/ thams
