162b7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'jig rten slu ba dang / 'dzem pa dang / ngo tsha ba med pa/ stong par smra zhing chad par lta ba/ glen pa/ slu ba can yin te/ de tshe 'phos nas ngan song du ltung bar
163a1(mdo sde): shes par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu gang tshig tu brjod pa tsam ram/ mnyan pa tsam gyis chog ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bsgom pa 'am/ nan tan bya mi dgos par
163a2(mdo sde): byang chub dang mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob tu zin na ni/ bskal pa gcig tsam la yud tsam thang cig gis/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sa'i khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sems
163a3(mdo sde): can thams cad byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/ mya ngan lnga 'da' bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ de ni de lta bu'i gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni theg pa chen po'i rtsa ba yin te/
163a4(mdo sde): byang chub kyi rgyu dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i them skas lta bu'o// rigs kyi bu gal te sems bskyed pa tsam mam/ smon lam btab pa tsam gyis chog ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam goms par nan tan bya/
163a5(mdo sde): mi dgos par/ byang chub dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob tu zin ni/ bskal pa gcig la yud tsam thang cig gis/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sa'i khams kyi rdul phra mo
163a6(mdo sde): snyed kyi sems can yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba zhig na// de ni de lta bu'i gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
163a7(mdo sde): ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu'i khyad par dang yon tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu gal te dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan du ma byas na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
163b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi bskal par bdag ni theg pa chen po pa'o zhes zer te/ 'chad dam/ nyan tam/ sems bskyed dam/ smon lam btab kyang / byang chub dang mya ngan las 'da' ba thob par mi
163b2(mdo sde): 'gyur la/ gzhan yang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las gdon mi nus so// rigs kyi bu dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan byas pas/ 'jig rten na rgyal rigs dang / bram ze la sogs pa rigs chen po dang /
163b3(mdo sde): rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha nas/ 'du shes med min skye mched stengs kyi bar du yod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yang yod
163b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ de dag kun kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan byed pa'i khyad par dang bye brag las gyur to// de bas na rigs kyi bu gang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob
163b5(mdo sde): par 'dod na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan te/ mi dge ba bcu'i sdom pa la mi gnas na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// gang myur
163b6(mdo sde): du theg pa chen po'i spyod yul chung bar 'dod dam/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod dam/ myur du dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'dod na/ sngar dge ba bcu'i
163b7(mdo sde): las kyi lam shin tu bsrung bar bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis ni dge ba'i chos thams cad dang / yon tan rnam par gzhag pa'i gzhi dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten
164a1(mdo sde): las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu mchog thob par byed pa'i rgyu yin no/ / de bas na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la shin tu nan tan bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag
164a2(mdo sde): gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su gcad de gsungs pa/ srid pa'i sdug bsngal kun gcod cing // byang chub chen po 'thob 'dod pa/ dge bcu'i 'khor lo nan tan la/ le lo ma byed brtson par gyis
164a3(mdo sde): theg pa gsum gyi dam chos dang / theg pa rnam gsum gang zag dang // rab tu byung ba thams cad la// 'khrul pa meng bar 'thob par 'gyur// theg chen spyod la dang mos shing // thams cad 'khor gyi
164a4(mdo sde): dbugs 'byin pa'i/ / chos mchog rtogs nas zhing dag der// byang chub chen po myur du 'thob// gal te srog gcod yongs spangs na// kun gyis bku ro zhing bla mar byed// rtag tu nad med tshe yang ring //
164a5(mdo sde): bde zhing skyed la gnod pa med// skye ba'i gnas ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas spyod yul lam la mos// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong // myur du bla med byang chub 'thob// ma byin len pa yongs
164a6(mdo sde): spangs na/ / mkhas pas bkur zhing bla mar byed// 'dod chags skye zhi lam kun zhi// 'dod chags med pa skye bar 'gyur// skye ba kun tu longs spyod ldan// sbyin bdag chen por de 'gyur te// rin chen mang
164a7(mdo sde): pos brgyan pa dang / / yid 'ongs sangs rgyas zhing yang 'thob// 'dod pas log g.yem yongs spangs na// nyon mongs dri ma zhi bor 'gyur// 'dod chags sred pa'i mtsho yang skems// rnam dag sangs rgyas
164b1(mdo sde): zhing myur 'thob/ / sems can rnam pa mang po yang // 'dod pa'i radam las 'byin par 'gyur// theg chen la ni rab bkod nas// tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyong du btsud// rdzun du smra ba yongs spang na// 'phags
164b2(mdo sde): pa'i dbang dang ye shes 'thob/ / rtag tu bden la smra bar dga'// brdzun du 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal 'jil// tshig gcig tshad mar btsugs pas no// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong // brdzun mi smra ba
164b3(mdo sde): bsgoms pas na/ / byang chub chen po myur du 'thob// phra ma'i chog smra yongs spangs na// dge ba'i chos kyi snod du 'gyur// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong // chad par lta bar yong mi 'gyur//
164b4(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i chags med dga' ba dang // rin chen gter gyi gzungs 'thob cing // zab mo'i chos kyi rgya mtsho rig/ myur du bla med byang chub 'thob// gal te zhe gcod tshig spangs te// 'jam zhing //
164b5(mdo sde): gnyen pa'i tshig smras na// sems can kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur// snga ma'i mi dge'i las kyang zhi// 'khor rnams rtag tu dga' ba dang // byang chub sems dpa'i ston par 'gyur// sangs
164b6(mdo sde): rgyas mang po'i spyod yul shes/ / sa bcu las kyang 'da' bar 'gyur// bkyal par smra ba yongs spangs na// mkhas par bkur zhing bla mar byed// gzhan la tshig tu smra ba kun// yon tan rnam
164b7(mdo sde): lnga 'thob par 'o gyur/ / rtag tu 'phags pa'i tshig nyan cing // 'phags pa'i lam tshol spro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongs rdzogs shing // thams cad mkhyen pa myur du 'thob// gal te
165a1(mdo sde): chags sems yongs spangs te/ / 'phags pa rnams la mi smod cing // ngur smrig gyon la mchod pa byed// theg pa gsum gyi byang chub bsgrub// rtag tu rnam dag zhing du skye/
165a2(mdo sde): ston pa'i gnas su gnas par 'gyur// bla med theg pa la zhon te// rgyal ba'i ye shes myur du 'thob// gal te gnod sems yongs spangs te// gcig tu byams pa'i sems bsgoms na// mnyam
165a3(mdo sde): par bzhag pa'ang myur du 'thob/ / 'phags pa'i spyod yul mos par 'gyur// rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing du skye// nyes pa'i skyon rnams kun dang bral// de la gnas na byang chub 'thob// gnod sems thams
165a4(mdo sde): cad spang bar bya/ / ngan par lta ba yongs spangs te// rnam dag dad pa'i sems bsgoms na// theg gsum ston la mos byed cing // sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa byed// ngan song kun las yongs thar te// 'phags
165a5(mdo sde): pa'i dge 'dun rnams dang phrad/ / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan// ye shes mchog kyang 'thob par 'gyur// dge ba bcu yi las lam gyis// byang chub mchog thob 'gyur zhes gsungs//
165a6(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug dang gzungs rnams dang // sa dang bzod pa skye bar 'gyur// bdag nyid che ba'i 'khor lo 'dis// ngan song thams cad rab bcom nas// sdig pa'i sgrib pa kun kyang choms// myur du byang chub
165a7(mdo sde): chen po thob/ / 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba las/ dge ba'i las kyi lam zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug go// / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang
165b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod do/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dag dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/
165b2(mdo sde): 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'a gyur pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
165b3(mdo sde): kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / ba glang dang /
165b4(mdo sde): rta dang / shing rta dang / lus kyi yan lag dang / rkang pa dang / lag pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / mgo dang / mig dang / rkang dang / klad pa dang / pags pa dang / rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag dang /
165b5(mdo sde): yul dang / srid dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / khang khyim dang / zhing 'brog la sogs pa de dag thams cad sbyin pa de re re byed na/ lus dang srog la mi lta zhing / bdag gcig pu 'jig
165b6(mdo sde): rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir sems bskyed de sbyin pa byed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad la byamos pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i myu gu bskyed pa'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa'i
165b7(mdo sde): sems skyed do/ / thabs mkhas pa dang / shes rab ma chog bskyed pa'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems skyed do// sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems skyed do// sems
166a1(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems skyed do/ / gzhan las spag go snyam pa med pa'i sems dang / brlang ba med pa'i sems dang / phrag dog
166a2(mdo sde): med pa'i sems dang / ser sna dang zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis sbyin po sbyin no// gang sbyin po'i dngos po che yang rung / rlung yang rung / chung ngu na zan chang gcig tsam gyi sbyin pa byas na yang / rnam par smin pa
166a3(mdo sde): 'bras bu la mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems skyed do/ / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i 'bras bu la mi re bar smin pa sbyin pa'i sems skyed do// rang sangs kyi theg pa'i 'bras bu la mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin pa'i
166a4(mdo sde): sems skyed do/ / gang sbyin po'i dngos po de che yang rung / rlung yang rung / chung ngu na zan chang gcig tsam gyi srin po byas na yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsngo zhing / sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems
166a5(mdo sde): skyed do/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing gi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ thog ma sems skyed pa na/ 'dod po rnam pa lnga yongs su
166a6(mdo sde): bsal ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams chen po'i zhing dur gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs
166a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongs su srung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis sbron pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed pa ni byams pa
166b1(mdo sde): dang snying rje chen po'i sems med kyi/ bdag gi dbul ba de spang ba dang / bdag sdug bsngal las thar pa dang / bdag bde ba thob par bya ba dang / bdag mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa byed de
166b2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi phyir sbyin pa byed pa ni ma yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa ni byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i sems kyis sems can thams cad kyi
166b3(mdo sde): dbul 'phongs spong ba dang / sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las gdon pa dang / sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir sbyin pa byed
166b4(mdo sde): kyi/ bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir sbyin pa spyod pa ma yin no// de lta bas na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams
166b5(mdo sde): kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyon thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed cing / yongs su srung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
166b6(mdo sde): chen po gang zang zing gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ 'dod pa rnam lnga'i mchog la sems mi chags te/ bdag nyid dbang ba bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sems can kun la sbyin pa byed de/
166b7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i sems dang / bdag gi sdug bsngal thams cad la ci mi snyam pa'i bzod pa'i sems dang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i sems dang
167a1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la bde ba sbyin pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i sems la gnas te sbyin pa byed do// de bas na nyan thos dang rang
167a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyi mchod/
167a3(mdo sde): ba dang / bsnyen bkur dang / srung ba byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gal te 'dod pa lnga la sems mi chags shing / byams pa dang snying rje chen pos sbyin pa byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
167a4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa zhes bya'o// gal te 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa rnam lnga yang ma spangs la/ byams pa dang snying rje chen
167a5(mdo sde): po yang med par sbyin pa byed na/ sbyin pa'i dngos po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa btang yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams
167a6(mdo sde): kyokyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin pas/ sbyin pa 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ma yin no/ de bas na 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa lnga spangs te/ byams pa dang snying rje chen po dang ldan pas sbyin pa
167a7(mdo sde): bya'o/ / gal te 'jig rten gyi 'dod po lnga yang ma spangs la/ byams pa dang snying rje chen po yang med par sbyin pa byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang mi bya la/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa
167b1(mdo sde): yang ma yin no/ / rigs kyi bu 'dod pa rnam lnga la rlags pas sbyin pa byed na/ bdag nyid kyi lus kyi sdug bsngal gyi cha cung zad kyang zhi bar mi 'gyur na/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal tshad med pa
167b2(mdo sde): bsal ba lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ zang zing sbyin pa'i 'khor lo ldan pa// mkhas pa
167b3(mdo sde): bsal ba dag pa'i mos pas/ / 'dod pa rnam lnga dag ni spangs te// sems can kun la phan dang bde byed// sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir gyi// rnam smin 'bras bu re phyir ma yin// sbyin pa'i dngos po byin
167b4(mdo sde): pa rlung yang / / yang dag bsod rnams zhing du 'gyur// sbyin pa'i dngos po mang du byas kyang // 'dod pa rnam lnga dag la gnas na// 'phags pa dag gi phyag rgyas ma btag/ ma nges pa yi tshogs la gnas
167b5(mdo sde): 'gyur/ / sbyin pa'i dngos po byin pa chung yang // 'dod pa lnga la mi gnas pa ni// nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal ba yi// yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur// de bas 'dod pa rnam lnga spangs la// rtag tu
167b6(mdo sde): nam dag sbyin po byed cing / / sems can kun la bde ba byas na// yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor
167b7(mdo sde): lo rnam pa bcu yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo de dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal ba'i phyir/ myur du nyi ma'i sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting
168a1(mdo sde): nge 'dzin thob cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams chen po'i zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang
168a2(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstan pa dam pa'i chos
168a3(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / 'jig rten gyi chos dang / 'jig rten las
168a4(mdo sde): 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos dang / zag pa zad pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos dang / gnyis su med pa'i chos rnams te/ byang chub sems
168a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rnam pa bcu po 'di la dad cing gus par byed pa dang / ji skad thos pa rnams gzungs su 'dzin cing yid la byed do// rab tu rtog go// mthar khong du chud par byed cing // gzhan
168a6(mdo sde): dag la yang ci rigs par ston par byed do/ / nam chos ston pa'i tshe na/ phrag dog med pa'i sems dang / ser sna med pa'i sems dang / nga rgyal med pa'i sems dang / rnyed par mi re ba'i sems dang //
168a7(mdo sde): gzhan mi smod pa'i sems dang / bdag mi bstod pa'i sems dang / bsti stang dang bcas pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / byams pa chen po'i sems dang / snying rje chen po'i sems
168b1(mdo sde): su bya'o/ / nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag la ni nyan thos kyi chos ston cing 'chad kyi/ de la rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
168b2(mdo sde): pa can gyi gang zag la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos ston gyi/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos sam/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang / theg pa chen po'i gang zag la ni theg pa chen po'i chos
168b3(mdo sde): sngon gyi/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po dang snod ji lta ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston gyi/ dbang po snod du ma gyur pa la chos mi ston to// gang
168b4(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'o sems can la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa spyod cig par ram/ nyan thos kyi theg pa spyod cig par mi skul lo// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi sems can la skabs kha cig tu theg
168b5(mdo sde): pa chen po'i spyod pa la nan tan byos shig ces bskul ba'i skabs ni yod do/ / nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi sems can la skabs kha cig tu rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i spyod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i spyod pa
168b6(mdo sde): la nan tan gyos shig ces bskul ba'i skabs kyang yod do/ / de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i dam pa'i chos chung ngu na tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/ tshigs su bcad pa phyed tsam la yang shin tu dang
168b7(mdo sde): cing bkur sti byed kyi/ de la 'phya ba 'am/ skur ba'am/ bgegs sam/ bar chad mi byed de/ chos ston pa la sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar 'du shes pa dang / chos nyan pa'i 'khor rnams la nad pa dang 'dra bar
169a1(mdo sde): 'du shes pa dang / gang 'chad pa'i chos la sman bzang po dang 'dra bar 'du shes shing / 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bcad de/ re ba med pas dam pa'i chos ston to// rigs kyi bu 'di
169a2(mdo sde): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi sbyin pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu zhes bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na/ 'dod pa lnga
169a3(mdo sde): yongs su bsal te/ myur du nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod
169a4(mdo sde): nams kyi zhing du 'gyur pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
169a5(mdo sde): kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ mkhas pa chos kyi sbyin pa spod pa dag/ snod bzhin theg pa gsum gyi chos ston to// theg pa gzhan dag de la ston
169a6(mdo sde): mi byed/ / thos nas de la 'phya zhing skur mi 'gyur// dbang po snod bzhin dam pa'i chos ston gyi// dbang po snod min dag la ma yin no// so sor ji ltar ji la mos pa bzhin// de dang de yi chos ston
169a7(mdo sde): mgu bar byed/ / theg pa chen po spyod pa'i gang zag la// theg pa rlung ngu rnams kyi chos mi ston// bar bar theg pa gnyis kyi gang zag la// theg pa 'bring dang rab kyi chos ston to// shin tu dad cing gus pas
169b1(mdo sde): chos mnyan gyi/ / de la 'phya zhing skur bar mi bya'o// chos smra ba la mchod pa byed pa ni// sangs rgyas 'dra bar de la 'du shes bskyed// kun nas nyon mongs pa yi nang bsal phyir// dam pa'i chos kyi sman dag
169b2(mdo sde): mnyan pa rabaskul/ / khe dang grags pa shin tu ring spangs te// dam pa'i chos dag bstan cing bshad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu bzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims rnam par
169b3(mdo sde): dag pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs
169b4(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang
169b5(mdo sde): bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/
169b6(mdo sde): thun mong ba dang / thun mong ma yin pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrim rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo thun mong ba gang zhe na/ gang khyim na gnas pa dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma'i tshul khrims kyi
169b7(mdo sde): sdom pa blangs pa/ yang na rab tu byung ba so so thar pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa ste/ sdom pa 'di dang so so thar pa'i tshul khrims 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i 'khor
170a1(mdo sde): lo thun mong ba ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thur mong ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa 'di'i dbang gis/ sems can
170a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa rmod par ram/ log par lta ba sel bar ram/ las kyi sgrib pa dang / 'khor ba las grol bar mi 'gyur te/ go che chen po'i 'khor lo zhes kyang mi bya/ byang chub sems dpa'
170a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i
170a4(mdo sde): 'khor lo thun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems dang / gnod pa med pa'i sems dang / khon du 'dzin pa med pa'i/
170a5(mdo sde): sems kyis rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims ngan pa can dang / sbyin pa dang / ser sna dang / byams pa dang / zhe sdang ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo
170a6(mdo sde): can rab 'bring tha ma kun la bye brag mi 'byed pa'i sems dang / khyad par med pa'i 'du shes kyis tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo // khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la zhe sdang med pa dang / khong
170a7(mdo sde): khre med pa dang / ngan par spyod pa med pas tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo // srid pa gsum gyi phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnam par rtog pa med pas tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo // 'dod pa'i khams la mi
170b1(mdo sde): gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo / / gzugs yod pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo // gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo // srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu/
170b2(mdo sde): thams cad la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo // rnyed pa dang mi rnyed pa la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo // 'du byed rnams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i
170b3(mdo sde): tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo
170b4(mdo sde): 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das
170b5(mdo sde): shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed
170b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ khyim na gnas shing sdom pa len pa// rab byung so so thar pa'i tshul khrims//
170b7(mdo sde): theg pa gnyis dang thun mong ba yin// byang chub chen po zhes ni mo bya// mkhas pa stong pa nyid chos sgom pa// 'jig rten kun la mi rten mi gnas// srid pa kun la gnas ma yin par// rnam par dag pa
171a1(mdo sde): rdul khrims srung ngo / / mtshan ma spong ba'i tshul khrims dag ni// rgyags bu med de zug pa kun med// tshul khrims 'di ltar srung ba dag ni// yang dag bsod nams zhing zhes de/
171a2(mdo sde): bya// rigs kyi dru gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i bzod pa'i bo che chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di nga
171a3(mdo sde): ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi'i song nams kyi'i
171a4(mdo sde): pa'i 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// re la ji ltar na bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo ga na
171a5(mdo sde): sa kyis byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa la ma tshan nyid rnam pa nyis te/ bzhin/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la'i ltar byung chub sems dpa'al
171a6(mdo sde): rten gyi bzod pa gang zhi na/ de ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i bzod pa ste/ sems can la dmigs pa/ len pa dang bcas pa// mtshan ma dang bcas pa/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la brten pa/
171a7(mdo sde): bso nams kyi las la brten te bzod par byed pa'o// gzhan yang bdag gi gzugs dang / grwa dang / dring / ro dang / reg byal brten nas bzod par byed pa'o// 'jug pa dang cas pang
171b1(mdo sde): bzod pa ci mi snyam pa med pa'i bzod pa dang / mthu zhan pa'i bzod pa sems can gtong ba'i bzod pa dang / g.yo dang sgyur bcas pa'i bzod pa dang / pha rol la 'dring pa'i bzod pa dang / sems can
171b2(mdo sde): la phan pa dang bde ba'i don mi byed pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi bzod pa zhes bya ste/ bzod pa 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dang
171b3(mdo sde): thun mong ba yin gyi/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya'o// de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang ma yin te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi
171b4(mdo sde): zhing yang dag pa zhes kyang mi bya'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzod pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ zag pa med pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'phags pa
171b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi chos chen po'i 'od kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir chags pa med pa'i bzod pa dang / bya ba'i dngos po thams cad dang / tshig du smra ba dang / rgyu dang
171b6(mdo sde): mtshan ma dang / yi ge dang / sgra skad thams cad yongs su bcad pa'i skye mched la brten pa'i bzod pa la spyod do// bzod pa 'di bsgoms pas/ kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum dang / bskal pa rnam gsum
171b7(mdo sde): dang / mtshan nyid gsum dang / dus gsum dang / srid pa gsum dang / 'du byed rnam gsum dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum dang / chu bo bzhi dang / mdung ba rnam bzhi dang / nye bar len pa bzhi dang / lus
172a1(mdo sde): kyi mdung ba rnam bzhi la sogs pa yongs su bcad pas/ bzod pa 'di bsgom pa'i tshe/ sems dang yid rab tu zhi bas/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das par
172a2(mdo sde): go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'i bzod pa zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'i bzod pa de dang ldan pas thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs
172a3(mdo sde): su bsal ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing
172a4(mdo sde): chen por 'gyur ba/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar
172a5(mdo sde): bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' skul pa/ bzod pa la ni rnam pa gnyis te/ mtshan mar bcad dang mtshan ma med pa// mtshan mar bcas pa'i bzod pa chags yod// mkhas pa dag ni de la mi stong
172a6(mdo sde): 'du byed rnam gsum phung po khams dang / / skye mched la brten bzod pa bsgom pa// de ni zag bcas bzod pa yin te// byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma yin// phyin ci log pa rnam bzhi bsal nas//
172a7(mdo sde): chags pa med pa'i bzod pa sgom zhing // 'du byed rnam pa gsum dag zhin// bzod pa 'di la thams cad bstod 'gyur// 'du byed thams cad rab tu zhi zhing // rtog pa thams cad yongs su spangs te//
172b1(mdo sde): sems ni nam mkha' 'dra bar mnyam pa// bzod pa 'di la thams cad bstod 'gyur// thams cad chos la ro gcig 'dun par// stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i zhi ba// sems ni ci la'ang mo gnas mi chags//
172b2(mdo sde): bzod pa 'di ni phan don cher 'gyur// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
172b3(mdo sde): po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na/ / thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nam/
172b4(mdo sde): kyi zhing chen por 'gyur pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i
172b5(mdo sde): brtson 'grus grang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i
172b6(mdo sde): 'grus gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po rnam pa gsum la nan tan byed do// gsum gang zhe na/ 'odi lta ste/
172b7(mdo sde): sbyin pa byed pa'i bsod nams kyi las dang / tshul khrims srung ba'i bsod nams kyi las dang / bsgom pa'i bsod nams kyi byed pa'i las so// las 'di dag byed pa ni brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum zhes
173a1(mdo sde): bya ste/ brtson 'grus rnam pa 'di dag ni/ sems can 'di dag ni dmigs pa/ zag pa dang bcas pa/ nye bar len pa dang bcas pa/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la brten pa/
173a2(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi las la brten pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi brtson 'grus zhes bya'o// brtson 'grus 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs kyi theg pa la sogs dang thun mong yin te/ go cha chen po'i
173a3(mdo sde): 'khor lo zhes mi bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub
173a4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' dag shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems
173a5(mdo sde): kyis/ nyon mongs pa'i las dang sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba ste/ brtson 'grus 'di ni 'phags pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ zag pa med pa/ nye bar len pa med pa/ rten dang gnas med de/
173a6(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / sbyin pa dang / ser sna dang / tshul khrims dang / ngan pa'i tshul khrims can dang / byams pa dang / zhe sdang dang / sems can rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma kun la mi 'byed
173a7(mdo sde): pa'i sems dang / bye brag med pa'i 'du shes kyis shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom mo// khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / dmigs pa med pas bya ba'i las byed de/
173b1(mdo sde): smra ba dang / rtog pa dang / dpyod pa'i gnas thams cad la mi gnas pa'i sems kyis shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom mo// srid pa gsum gyi phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la rnam par rtog/
173b2(mdo sde): pa med pas shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ 'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / gzugs yod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / gzugs
173b3(mdo sde): med pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thams cad la mi rtog pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa kun la mi gnas
173b4(mdo sde): pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / 'du byed rnams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad ba'i brtson 'grus dang / 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po gsum la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang /
173b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po rnam pa gsum la shin tu brtsonar grus rtsom ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po
173b6(mdo sde): 'khor lo zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo de dag dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal te/
173b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
174a1(mdo sde): kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen papar byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir
174a2(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ dbang po drug la shin tu rlags pa'i// byis pa chu bo lngas ni khyer ba// shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom yang // mkhas pa rnams kyis de la smod 'gyur// sems can dmigs
174a3(mdo sde): shing zag dang bcas la/ / len par bcas shing brtson 'grus rtsom na// yang dag bsod nams zhing ma yin te// byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma yin// mkhas pa brtson 'grus rtsom pa dag ni// chags pa
174a4(mdo sde): thams cad ring du spas te/ / sems ni ci la'ang mi gnas mi chags// yang dag bsod nams zhing zhes de bya// ming dang gzugs la chags pa med cing // phung po khams dang skye mched spangs te// thams
174a5(mdo sde): cad 'khor gyi rten du 'gyur pa/ / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po// 'jig rten spyod kyang chu zla bzhin te// 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i mthar phyin// 'khor lo 'dis ni yongs su bcom pa
174a6(mdo sde): skye bo kun nas nyon mongs bcings pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
174a7(mdo sde): chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams
174b1(mdo sde): cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi gon
174b2(mdo sde): chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi
174b3(mdo sde): bsam gtan gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /
174b4(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs yod pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdom pa
174b5(mdo sde): gsum la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par grol ba gsum la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / yang dag par spong ba
174b6(mdo sde): gzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / dbang po lnga la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / stobs lnga la gnas nas bsam gtan
174b7(mdo sde): sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / sa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan
175a1(mdo sde): sgom pa dang / chu'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / me'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rlung gi khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /
175a2(mdo sde): nam mkha'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / bde ba'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i
175a3(mdo sde): tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan
175a4(mdo sde): sgom pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la gnA nas bsam
175a5(mdo sde): gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten 'di la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes chung ngu la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang /
175a6(mdo sde): 'du shes chen po la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes tshad med pa la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa ste/ bsam gtan de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa/ nye bar len pa dang
175a7(mdo sde): bcas pa/ chags pa dang bcas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya'o// bsam gtan 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong ba zhes
175b1(mdo sde): bya ste/ go che chen po'i 'khor lo ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin no// de la ji ltar na/
175b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / khams dang bral bar bsam gtan
175b3(mdo sde): sgom pa dang / skye mched dang bral ba rab sam gtan sgom pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs kyi khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams
175b4(mdo sde): dang bral bar bsam ga tan sgom pa dang / sdom pa gsum dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par thar pa gsum dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang bral bar
175b5(mdo sde): bsam gtan sgom pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / dbang po lnga dang bral bsam gtan sgom pa dang /
175b6(mdo sde): stobs lnga dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sa'i khams
175b7(mdo sde): dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / chu'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / me'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rlung gi khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / nam mkha'i
176a1(mdo sde): khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / bde bar tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdug bsngal du
176a2(mdo sde): tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /
176a3(mdo sde): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan
176a4(mdo sde): sgom pa dang / 'jig rten 'di dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes rlung ngu dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes chen po
176a5(mdo sde): dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes tshad med pa dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa ste/ bsam gtan 'di ni 'phags pa'i 'od zer chen po skyed pa/ zag pa zad pa med pa/ nye bar len pa med
176a6(mdo sde): pachags pa med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
176a7(mdo sde): bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad
176b1(mdo sde): las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa
176b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su gcad de bka' stsal pa/ bdag gi 'ur lci spong ba'i phyir ni// dmigs dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin bsgoms te// bdag gis
176b3(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs gcod 'dod/ / yang dag mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin// snod la rten cing rtog dang bcas pa// rnam par grol 'dod ting 'dzin sgom yang // tshu rol pha rol mu la gnas na// sems can dag la phan de
176b4(mdo sde): byed min/ / sems can kun la phan dang bde phyir// ting 'dzin sgom zhing khur lci spangs te// kun nas nyon mongs thams cad sel ba// de ni yang dag mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid// sems can thams cad sim par
176b5(mdo sde): byed phyir/ / mi gnas pa yi ting 'dzin bsgoms te// 'dod pa'i srid pa thams cad chod pa// de ni dri gros chen po zhes bya// srid pas bcings pa thams cad bkrol te// 'jigs pa med pa'i grong du gzung phyir//
176b6(mdo sde): rab tu zhi ba'i ting 'dzin bsgom pa// de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o// / 'dus pa chen po las/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen
176b7(mdo sde): bo'i mdo bam po bcu pa/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi go che chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
177a1(mdo sde): gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
177a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na shes rab kyi go/
177a3(mdo sde): cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab ni rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i
177a4(mdo sde): shes rab ce na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa gsum gyi dam pa'i chos klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / nyan pa dang / pha rol la ston cing 'chad pa 'ba' zhig la rten te
177a5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi shes rab kyi sgron ma dbyung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos
177a6(mdo sde): shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan la rgyas par ston cing 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan byed pa dang / de bzhin
177a7(mdo sde): gshegs pas bstan pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos la klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan la ston cing 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan
177b1(mdo sde): du spyod do/ / de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i chos la brtson 'grus su klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan yang rgyas par ston cing 'chad pa dang /
177b2(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan byed pa ste/ 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i lam gyi yan lag tshol ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam tshol ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam du gtogs pa'i rnam par grol ba
177b3(mdo sde): tshol ba ma yin/ rab tu zhi ba yang dag pa'i shes rab la nan tan byed pa ma yin te/ rtag tu lta ba dang bcas pa/ mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i shes rab la nan tan byed do// de ltar len pa dang bcas pa/ chags pa dang bcas
177b4(mdo sde): pa'i shes rab ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi shes rab ces bya'o// shes rab de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin te/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya/ de la byang chub
177b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes
177b6(mdo sde): rab ce na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi lam la brtson 'grus su nan tan byed pa na/ ci nus su theg pa gsum gyi yang dag pa'i chos la klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs
177b7(mdo sde): bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan la rgyas par ston cingar cad kyang / de la dmigs su med pa'i sbyor ba la gnas te mi gso ba dang / mi rtog pa dang / ngo babo nyid med pa dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i sems dang / rab tu/
178a1(mdo sde): zhi ba'i sems dang / 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med pa'i shes rab dang / chags pa med pa'i sems dang / skye ba dang 'gog pa med pa'i sems dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang / chos mnyam
178a2(mdo sde): pa nyid kyi sems dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sems dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i sems dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sems dang / bdag med pa'i sems dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i sems dang / rab tu zhi ba dang /
178a3(mdo sde): bzod pa dang / rtog pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis grub pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i sa la shin tu thabs mkhas pas bde bar gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa mi chags pa'i mchog dam pa'i blo gros kyi sa la thabs mkhas
178a4(mdo sde): pas bde bar gnas pa ste/ shes rab 'di ni len pa med la chags pa med pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub
178a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
178a6(mdo sde): bya'o/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
178a7(mdo sde): mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
178b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad
178b2(mdo sde): kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na thabs mkhas pa'i gon
178b3(mdo sde): chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i
178b4(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa gang yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi don nam/ gzhan gyi don nam/ gnyis ka'i don la bdag dang gzhan du rtog cing / bzo dang sgyu rtsa la rnam pa sna tshogs
178b5(mdo sde): kyis/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang pha dang /
178b6(mdo sde): ma dang / nad pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / mgon dang rten med pa dang / gnod pa mang pos sdug bsngal bar gyur pa mthong na/ shin tu thabs mkhas pas sgrol zhing / bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pazhes sems can
178b7(mdo sde): yongs su smin par byed do/ / byang chub sems dpa' de bdag theg pa chen po la gnas pas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin pa nyan thos dang
179a1(mdo sde): / rang sangs rgyas kyi dbang po yongs su ma smin pa la shin tu phra la zab pa/ dam pa'i chos ston te slob tu gzhug pa dang / 'phags pa'i bsam gtan la nan tan byed du gzhug go// gzhan yang /
179a2(mdo sde): don dam pa'i bden pa bstan te/ nan tan byed du gzhug pa dang / phyin ci log bzhi las 'da' zhing mi ltung ba'i chos kyi mtshan nyid rig par bya ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gzhol bar bya ba nas/ gzhan yang
179a3(mdo sde): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / lhag ma
179a4(mdo sde): dang bcas pa dang / lhag ma ma lus pa'i lam dang / lam gyi 'bras bu'i bar du 'jug par bya ba la mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par byed do// sems can gang khe dang / grags pa dang / longs spyod la rmugs te/ dbang
179a5(mdo sde): po rgod pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa la ni/ mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / ma mo klog pa dang / 'don pa byed du gzhug pa dang / sangs rgyas gzhan gyis bshad pa las gzhan pa/ rnam par grol ba dang 'thun pa'i gtsug
179a6(mdo sde): lag klog cing 'don du bcug ste/ yongs su smin par byed do// sems can gang sbyin pa byed pa la mi mos pa la ni/ rin po che dang / nor dbyig rnam pa sna tshogs gtong bar bskul bas yongs su smin par byed do// sems can
179a7(mdo sde): gang gtum pa/ mi nges pa'i rang bzhin can la tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi slob tu sgrol ba dang / sems can gang zhe sdang can la bzod pa slob par skul ba dang / sems can gang le lo can la ni brtson 'grus slob par skul
179b1(mdo sde): ba dang / sems can gang sems g.yengs pa la ni bsam gtan sgom par sprul pa dang / sems can gang 'chal pa'i shes rab can la yang dag pa'i chos ston pas/ bka' lung brda sprod cing lung 'bog pa
179b2(mdo sde): la thabs mkhas pas yongs su smin par byed do/ / sems can gang dkon ma chog gsum la mngon par ma dad cing mi gnas pa la'ang mi spyod pa can la ni/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
179b3(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang / dge bsnyen pa'i sdom pa la bslab pa dang / bsnyen gnas pa'i sdom pa bslab pas yongs su smin par byed do// gzhan yang bzo dang sgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas la slob
179b4(mdo sde): cing spyod du btsud pas yongs su smin par byed do/ / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyi rnam pa ni klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed pas mang ngo // /
179b5(mdo sde): de ltar yi ge dang / gtsug lag dang / bzo dang / sgyu rtsal gyi las kyi gnas thams cad la lhag pa'i spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis mu stegs can dang / ston pa
179b6(mdo sde): gzhan la zhugs pa thams cad btul ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// thabs mkhas pa 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin te/ sangs
179b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos thams cad gnas pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ thabs mkhas pa spyod pa'i gnas su gyur pa/ shin tu thabs mkhas pa lhun gyis grub pas rtog pa med pa/ phyir ldog pa med pa'i chos su gyur pa'o//
180a1(mdo sde): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang ston pa mkhas pa la'ang mi sten/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la'ang mi ltos par 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa la nan tan byed na/ byang
180a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de ni 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pas rmongs pa yin te/ ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ro// de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes la gzhol zhing gnas par yang
180a3(mdo sde): mi nus la/ thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin no// shin tu thabs mi mkhas pas/ sems can gyi dbang po dang spong pa'i khyad par yang mi shes la/ shin tu thabs mkhas pa la yang
180a4(mdo sde): mongs par gyur pas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin pa dang / theg pa chen po'i dbang por ma smin pa dag la theg pa chen po ston pa dang / slob cing /
180a5(mdo sde): na tan byed du bcug go/ gang theg pa chen po'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos ston cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la slob
180a6(mdo sde): cing nan tan byed du bcug go/ / gang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos ston cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa la slob cing nan tan byed du bcug go/
180a7(mdo sde): gang nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni 'khor ba'i chos la bde ba dang dga' bar ston te/ 'khor ba'i chos la skyo ba skyed par mi ston to// gzhan yang shin tu thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas/
180b1(mdo sde): sems can gang srog gcod pa la dga' ba nas/ de bzhin du log par lta ba'i bar du mos pa dag la ni shin tu zab pa theg pa chen po'i chos ston te/ de la 'khor ba 'di nas shi 'phos nas pha rol du skye zhing
180b2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa myong ba la skyo zhing 'jigs pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos spong ba mi ston to// gzhan yang shin tu thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas/ sems can gang tshul
180b3(mdo sde): khrims srung bar mos pa la ni sbyin pa spyod du bcug go/ / sems can gang bzod pa sgom par mos pa la ni bzod pa spong ba ston cing / tshul khrims srung du bcug go// sems can gang brtson 'grus
180b4(mdo sde): rtsom par mos pa la ni brtson 'grus spong ba ston cing / bzod pa spyod du bcug go// sems can gang bsam gtan sgom par mos pa la ni bsam gtan spong ba sten cing / brtson 'grus la nan tan byed du
180b5(mdo sde): bcug go/ / sems can gang shes rab sgom par mos pa la ni shes rab spong ba ston cing / bsam gtan sgom du bcug go// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa la rmongs
180b6(mdo sde): pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed mi nus te/ sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa'i grogs por gyur to// thabs mkhas pa 'di ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa/
180b7(mdo sde): chags pa dang bcas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
181a1(mdo sde): pa dang thun mong ba yin te/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod
181a2(mdo sde): nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi don btang ste/
181a3(mdo sde): gzhan gyi don lhur byed pas bzo dang sgyu rtsa la rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par ston pas/ yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
181a4(mdo sde): rgyas dang / pha dang / ma la bsnyen bkur dang mchod pa byed pa dang / nad pa dang / 'phongs pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / mgon dang skyabs med pa dang / shin tu sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos gzir ba la thabs
181a5(mdo sde): kyis sgrol ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis sems can yongs su smin par byed de/ ci la mos pa dang / dbang po dang / snod ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la dam pa'i chos ston to// gzhan yang rim
181a6(mdo sde): gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa slob cing nan tan byed par skul ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni theg pa chen po slob cing nan tan byed par skul ba dang / gal te nyan thos dang rang sangs
181a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi theg par dbang po ma smin pa la ni/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis chos kyis skyo ba ston cing / 'khor bas skyo ba dang mya ngan las 'da' ba tshol bar skul lo// sems can gang srog gcod pa la mos
181b1(mdo sde): pa nas/ log par lta ba'i bar du chags pa la dbang po dang / rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor bar 'khor ba'i chos ston pa dang / 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos nas pha rol tu skye ba 'di dang / pha rol
181b2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu myong ba bstan te/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos kyis 'jigs pa dang skyo ba ston to// kha cig la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston to// kha cig la ni rang sangs rgyas
181b3(mdo sde): kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston to/ / kha cig la ni bla na med pa'i theg pa'i chos yang dag pa bstan te/ khad kyis slob tu 'jug go// sems can gang sbyin pa la mos par gyur pa rnams la ni/ tshul khrims
181b4(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'i mchog srung bar ston pa de bzhin du/ rgyas par sems can gang bsam gtan la mos par gyur pa la ni/ bag pa med pa 'phags pa'i lam gyi mchog gis bsdus pa dang / shes rab bran
181b5(mdo sde): med pa ston cing nan tan byed du bcug ste/ shin tu thabs mkhas pa 'di ni dmigs pa med pa dang / chags pa med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i
181b6(mdo sde): go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa
181b7(mdo sde): rnam lnga yongs su bsal bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams can las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
182a1(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
182a2(mdo sde): kyis don de dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ shes rab nan tan rnam gnyis te// 'jig rten bcas dang 'jig rten 'das// chags pa de ni 'jig rten bcas// chags med pa ni
182a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'das/ / shin tu thabs mkhas nan tan ni// khyad par rnam pa gnyis la gnas// dmigs pa yod pa 'jig rten bcas// dmigs med de ni 'jig rten 'das// gang zhig theg pa gcig ston pa//
182a4(mdo sde): de ni legs par chos ston min// bdag kyang yongs su mi smin na// gzhan gyi don du ga la 'gyur// gcig tu mi dge sems can la// theg pa gsum gyi chos ston na/ de ni gti mug rmongs pa ste// byang chub chen po
182a5(mdo sde): de'i ma yin/ / theg pa gsum la 'jug spro zhing // yang dag pa yi chos 'dod la// 'khor bar spro ba'i chos ston na// mkhas pa'i rang bzhin de ma yin// rtse gcig blo yis rab brtags te// 'dod dang mos pa
182a6(mdo sde): bzhin du ston/ / 'di ni shin tu thabs mkhas pas// mkhas pa rnams kyis de la bsngags// sems can sdig pa dag spyod kyang // theg pa gsum gyi snod 'gyur na// dbang po snod bzhin chos bstan te// sdig
182a7(mdo sde): pa kun las grol bar byed/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa rmen bori go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
182b1(mdo sde): 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi song /
182b2(mdo sde): nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na byams pa chen po'i go cha
182b3(mdo sde): chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa dang / sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa'o// chos la dmigs
182b4(mdo sde): pa'i byams pa ni byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o/ / sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni byams pa chen po'i go cha zhes mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can la dmigs
182b5(mdo sde): pa'i byams pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong du gyur pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ni bdag la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir sems can la dmigs pa'i bzod pa la nan tan
182b6(mdo sde): byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ni bdag zhi ba dang / bdag mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / bdag gi sgrib pa bsal ba dang / bdag gi kun nas nyon mongs pa gcad pa'i phyir yin gyi/ sems can thams
182b7(mdo sde): cad kyi phyir/ sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pas brtsomar grus la nan tan byed pa ni ma yin no// de bas na byams pa 'di ni byams pa chen po zhes mi bya ste/ go cha chen po ma yin no// chos la dmigs
183a1(mdo sde): pa'i byams pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang thun mong ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'ba' zhig gis nan tan byed nus par 'gyur ro//
183a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du brtson 'grus kyi sbyor bas/ chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa 'di la nan tan byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems
183a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po ni/ sems can thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su gcad pa'i phyir/ shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa
183a4(mdo sde): la nan tan byed do/ / de bas na byams pa 'di ni byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po zhes bya'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa la nan tan byed pa ni phung po la mi gnas/ skye mched
183a5(mdo sde): la mi gnas/ khams la mi gnas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas pa nas/ byang chub kyi lam gyi yan lag gi bar du mi gnas so// 'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams la mi
183a6(mdo sde): gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas/ 'jig rten 'di la mi gnas/ 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas/ tshu rol gyi mu la mi gnas/ pha rol gyi mu la mi gnas/ dmigs pa la mi gnas/ mi dmigs
183a7(mdo sde): pa la mi gnas te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa la nan tan byed pas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa'i sa las shin tu 'das te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i
183b1(mdo sde): chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa chen po'i go che chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byam pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sem bskyed nas 'dod/
183b2(mdo sde): pa rnam pa lnga yong su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing dur gyur pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
183b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang ni rang
183b4(mdo sde): rgyal ba/ / sems can dmigs pa'i byams sgom pa// sems la bcu gsum skyon 'chang zhing // bdag la phan pa'i don phyir rtsol// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen ni// sems can thams cad kun gyi
183b5(mdo sde): phyir/ thun mong ma yon byams chen bsgoms// bcu gsum sems kyi skyon rnams spangs// dri ma bcu gsum rab spangs nas// byang chub chen por gzhol bar byed// chos la dmigs pa'i byams bsgoms
183b6(mdo sde): na/ / bsod nams zhing grub ring ba min// bcu gsum stobs la bder gnas na// sems can kun las shin tu 'phags// ji ltar seng ge'i rgyal po de// ri dgas kun las 'phags pa bzhin// bcu ga sum
183b7(mdo sde): dgra rnams shin tu btul/ / rtag dang chad pa'i mthar 'dzin spangs// sems la cis kyang mi gos na// myur du byang chub chen po 'thob// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying
184a1(mdo sde): rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal te//
184a2(mdo sde): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur zhing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa
184a3(mdo sde): dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// de ji lta zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad ni bdag la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje la spyod kyi/ sems can thams
184a4(mdo sde): cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje chen po skyed pa ma yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag 'ba' zhig la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje chen po skyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems
184a5(mdo sde): can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir snying rje chen po skyed do/ / de bas na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo dang ldan pas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las
184a6(mdo sde): shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen
184a7(mdo sde): bkur bya bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis sems can yongs su smin par byed do//
184b1(mdo sde): snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir sbyin pas yongs su sdud pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ rin po che dang / nor dang / dbyig dang / theg pa dang / bran dang / las byed pa'i mi dang / yul dang /
184b2(mdo sde): sring dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / lus dang / srog gi bar du yongs su gtong ba la ser sna med de/ mi dmigs pa'i spyod pa la sbyor bas 'dul ba'i sems can yod par mi mthong / sbyin pa byed par mi mthong / len
184b3(mdo sde): par mi mthong / nor gyi dngos por mi mthong / sbyin pa spong par mi mthong / sbyin pa byas pa'i 'bras bur mi mthong ba nas/ mi dmigs pa'i bar du yang mi mthong ba de lta bu'i snying rje chen po skyed do// sems can
184b4(mdo sde): thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir ngog snyan po dang / don bsgrub pa dang / don mthun pas ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhin du/ mi dmigs pa yang mi mthong ba'i bar du de dang des rgyas par ston cing #
184b5(mdo sde): do/ / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu mi chog dam pa'i dul ba'i sems dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang / tshad med pa'i sems dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
184b6(mdo sde): thams cad la mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i sems kyis/ gang nas gang du skyes kyang g.yo ba med pa dang / mi gnas pa'i snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'dis snod du gyur pa'i sems can thams cad yongs
184b7(mdo sde): su smin par byed pa la skyo ba med do/ / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub
185a1(mdo sde): #sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
185a2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
185a3(mdo sde): ba pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ shin tu
185a4(mdo sde): zab mo dam pa'i chos dag/ snying rje chen po'i gzhir ni de 'gyur// shin tu dpag dka' nam mkha' 'dra ste// gnas pa med de gzugs kyang med de// byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus chen po// yon tan
185a5(mdo sde): chen po dang ni ldan te/ / rgyal ba'i ye shes snying rje chen pos// dpa' bo 'jig rten 'da' bar des 'gyur// mgon dang skyabs med sems can dag ni// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnyog pas bcings pa// snying rje chen
185a6(mdo sde): po'i chu yis bkrus te/ / sems can rnam par grol bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje skyed pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skams par byed de// nyan thos theg pa'i 'khor rnams dang ni// rang rgyal
185a7(mdo sde): theg pa spyod pas ma yin/ / 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sems can// ngan song dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ba// snying rje chen po'i chu yis bkrus te// sdug bsngal kun las grol bar byed do// rigs kyi bu
185b1(mdo sde): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chog so so yang dag par rig pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshad med pa/ mtha' yas pa/ shin tu rgya chen po dang ldan pa ji skad sangs rgyas kyi
185b2(mdo sde): chos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo
185b3(mdo sde): 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi
185b4(mdo sde): zhing chen por 'gyur pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
185b5(mdo sde): chen po tshig so so yang dag par rig pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshad med pa/ mtha' yas pa/ shin tu rgya che ba dang ldan pa ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin rnams dang
185b6(mdo sde): gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad la shin tu rtog pa ni/ ji ltar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
185b7(mdo sde): gyi 'od kyis nam mkha' kun tu khyab pa bzhin du/ sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ rten po ma pa/ mi gnas pa/ gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo
186a1(mdo sde): thams cad la sems kyi spyod pa med pa/ mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyis rnam par zhen pa dang bral ba/ sems/
186a2(mdo sde): kyi spyod pa med pa las/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba rnam gsum skyes te/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin par tshor ba la
186a3(mdo sde): sems rab tu zhi zhing rlags pa med do/ / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sgra dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna dang / dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa
186a4(mdo sde): dang / lce dang / ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus dang / reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid dang / chos dang / yid
186a5(mdo sde): kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar du gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad rtag tu zhi zhing chags pa med do// sems dang / yid dang /
186a6(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba rnam gsum ste/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin par tshor ba la sems rtag tu zhi zhing chags pa med do//
186a7(mdo sde): dus gsum gyi phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad la len pa med pa sems kyi spyod pa med pa'o// gang ji snyed khams gsum dang / 'du byed gsum dang / reg bya gsum dang /
186b1(mdo sde): tshor ba gsum dang / dbang po gsum dang / theg pa gsum dang / sdom pa gsum dang / rnam par grol ba gsum dang / rnam pa de dag thams cad la sems rab tu zhi ba/ gnas pa med pa/ mtshan ma med pa
186b2(mdo sde): len pa med pas mnyam pa nyid du gnas so/ / gang ji snyed sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la sems kyi
186b3(mdo sde): spyod pa med pa rab tu zhi bar gnas so/ / de bzhin du dran po nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan
186b4(mdo sde): log bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang sems kyi spyod pa med pa rab tu zhi bar gnas so// gang ji snyed dgu mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa la yang sems kyi spyod pa med pa rab
186b5(mdo sde): tu zhi bar gnas so/ / gzhan yang mngon par 'du byed pa gsum dang / chos la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang / lam gyi yan lag dang / lam gyi rang bzhin 'dren par byed pa dag la yang len pa med pa
186b6(mdo sde): sems kyi spyod pa med pa/ kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma yin pa dang / nye bar len pa dang bcas pa dang / nye bar len pa med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa
186b7(mdo sde): med pa dang / tshu rol gyi mu dang / pha rol gyi mu dang / chung ngu dang / chen po dang / tshad med pa dang / byed pa dang / mi byed pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du mi ston pa thams cad kyi rnam pa la
187a1(mdo sde): sems kyi spyod pa med pa rab tu zhi bar gnas so/ / gang ji snyed byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / thabs mkhas pas sems can smin par byed pa nas/ bsrung bar bya ba
187a2(mdo sde): med pa gsum dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du chos thams cad kyi rnam pa la len pa med pa sems kyi spyod pa med pa rab tu zhi bar gnas so// byang chub sems
187a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis tshor ba rnam gsum gyi nyes pa yongs su bsal ba dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad yongs su zhi ba dang / mtshan ma'i chos thams cad yongs su spong
187a4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang ji snyed nam mkha'i mig dang / spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang 'dren par 'gyur te/ byang chub
187a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'khor lo de la gnas pas/ gang 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te/ ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang / gzhan yang srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnams su 'khor
187a6(mdo sde): bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bsal te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi myong bar byed do// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ mun pa nag pos nam mkha' thams cad
187a7(mdo sde): yog pa na/ nyi ma shar ba'i tshe mun pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang tshig so so yang dag par rig pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshad med pa
187b1(mdo sde): / mtha' yas pa/ yangs shing rgya chen po dang ldan pa ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa go che chen po'i 'khor lo
187b2(mdo sde): yang grub cing 'dren par yang 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang nam mkha'i mig dang / spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la gnas pas/ dpag tu
187b3(mdo sde): med pa nam mkha' lta bu ye shes kyi nyi mas phyin ci log bzhi'i mun pa yongs su bsal te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa mi dge pa'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te/ ngan 'gro mnar med pa dang / gzhan yang
187b4(mdo sde): srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su sel te/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu myong bar mi byed do// gzhan yang de'i dbang gis sangs
187b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos rnams la dbang thob pa dang / phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du mi 'gro zhing rjes su mi spyod pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / byang
187b6(mdo sde): nuchub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / yon tan
187b7(mdo sde): thams cad la sems mi ngoms pa nas/ byang chub kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad de/ rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba ni chung ngu na rmi lam du yang bar chad med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de la
188a1(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig so so yang dag par rigs pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshad med pa/ mtha' yas pa/ yangs shing rgya che
188a2(mdo sde): ba dang ldan pa ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'dren par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
188a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan dang po nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du snyoms par 'jug pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi
188a4(mdo sde): bar du snyems par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas na/ tshor ba rnam gsum dang / 'du byed gsum po yongs su bcad de/
188a5(mdo sde): mngon par 'du byed pa dang / g.yo ba'i sems kyi spyod pa med pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / sems pa dang / reg pa dang / yid la byed pa la sogs pa kun gcod par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin 'di la
188a6(mdo sde): gnas na/ zhag gcig gam/ zhag bdun gyi bar du bsam gtan gyi zas za bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin de las langs na yang sems rab tu zhi ba len pa med cing ldan ner gnas par 'gyur ro//
188a7(mdo sde): gzhan yang don dam pa'i mthas gtugs pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog go/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas na/ sems rab tu mnyam pas nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa dang / lus kyi
188b1(mdo sde): ba spu'i bu ga kun nas zil dngar gyi thigs pas skar ma snar ma lta bu mngon par byung bas/ kun nas nyon mongs pas bcings pa'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas
188b2(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i dran pa thob ste/ dga' ba khyad par can gyis lus la khyab par gyur pa ni ji ltar lha'i sras po dbang phyug chen po bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'jug na/ lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu kun nas rab tu
188b3(mdo sde): bde ba myong ba bzhin/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de lus la bde ba reg pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas sangs rgyas mthong ba las mtshan ma gzhan mthong ba
188b4(mdo sde): med do/ / byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe sangs rgyas gcig yid la byas na sangs rgyas gcig mthong ngo // gal te sangs rgyas mang po yid la byas na sangs rgyas mang po mthong ngo // gal te sangs rgyas kyi
188b5(mdo sde): sku chung bar yid la byas na sangs rgyas kyi sku chung ngu mthong ngo / / gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku chen por yid la byas na sangs rgyas kyi sku chen por mthong ngo // gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med par yid la byas na sangs
188b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sku tshad med par mthong ngo / / gal te bdag gi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mtshan dang ldan par yid la byas na bdag gi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong ngo // gal te
188b7(mdo sde): gzhan gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi skur yid la byas na gzhan gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong ngo / / gal te sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa dang / ji snyed gzugs su
189a1(mdo sde): gtogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gru mtshan dang ldan par yid la byas na/ sems can dang / sems ma yin pa dang / ji snyed gzugs su gtogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas
189a2(mdo sde): kyi sku dang ra dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong gi/ gzugs su mi mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe yang 'di snyam du/ chos thams cad dang gzugs thams cad ni sgyu ma dang 'dra ste/ yang
189a3(mdo sde): dag pa ma yin pas bdag gis tshor ba rnam gsum dang / 'du byed gsum la sogs pa chos thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bcad do snyam nas/ 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/
189a4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas blo sngon du btang ba bzhin du thams cad yongs su bcad de/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ro'i zas kyis 'tshe'o// gal te na zhag bdun nam/ zhag bdun gnyis sam/ bdun gsum mam/
189a5(mdo sde): 'azhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ drug gam/ bdun nam/ brgyad dam/ gal te na bskal pa tshad med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du ci nus su gnas te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi zas za'o// ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/
189a6(mdo sde): sems rab tu zhi bas ci la yang mi chags te bde bar gnas so// gal te don dam pa'i mthas gtugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs na yang sngar ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan dang ldan pa yid
