286a1(mdo sde): so/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor te mdun du 'dar nas/ yon tan gyi bkod pa chen po dang ldan pas shin tu
286a2(mdo sde): lhag ge'o/ / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi 'od kyis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas khyab par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis/
286a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
286a4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ skyes bu dam pa
286a5(mdo sde): de gnyis kyis tshig 'thun par sgra dbyangs gcig tu/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// gzi brjid mtshungs med yon tan phung po gcig la phyag 'tshal/
286a6(mdo sde): lo// drang srong chen po kun mkhyen yon tan kun gyi pha rol gshegs// thams cad zil gnon srid pa gsum gyi chags pa'i lam las 'das// shAkya khyu mchog dri bral bla ba'i zhal la
286a7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ / nyi ma dri med lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa rnam par mdzes// mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis dag gi go cha mnabs gyur cing // dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis sbas pa 'jig rten kun/
286b1(mdo sde): tu gsal// mi mchog khyod mtshungs 'jig rten gsum na gang yang yong ma mchis// bde bar gshegs pa'i sku yi 'od kyis gang tshe reg gyur pa// de'i tshe 'jig rten nyi ma zla ba nor bu zhugs rnams/
286b2(mdo sde): dang // brgya byin tshangs pa lnga dang de bzhin mi ci rnams kyi 'od// snag tshar phung po bzhin du mog mo ga mi snang gsal ma mchis// rgyal ba zhing gcig na ni yang dag bzhugs par gda' bzhin du// 'gro ba'i
286b3(mdo sde): don du skad cig gcig gis mtha' yas zhing du gshegs/ / ston pa'i bzhud dang byon pa 'tshal ba su yang yong ma mchis// mdzad pa dag dang 'dul ba sna tshogs dag gis sems can 'dul// spu yi khung
286b4(mdo sde): gcig nang du mtha' yas zhing rnams ston mdzad kyang / / 'phel ba dang ni bro bar gyur pa gang yang yong ma mchis// 'di ni ji bzhin las dang byed pa rgyu dang 'bras gda' la// sems can rnams la gnod pa
286b5(mdo sde): ma mchis 'dres par gyur ma mchis/ / gang na sems can dmyal bdud 'gro yi dgas ma mchis shing // rgyal ba'i sras po grags pa chen po dag gis yongs gang la// mi khom brgyad po dag dang bral te
286b6(mdo sde): mchog tu nyams dga' ba'o/ / yongs dag zhing de dag kyang mi mchog la lar ston pa mdzad// lha mi gang dag mi 'jigs bag ma mchis pa bsrang srad du// sems dmyal dud 'gro yi dgas 'gro ba shin tu mi
286b7(mdo sde): bzad pa'i/ / kun nas nyon mongs zhing rnams la la dag kyang bstan mdzad nas// de dag thams cad bde bar gshegs la skyabs su nye bar mchi// zhing gzhan la la dag kyang nam mkha' lta bur ston pa
287a1(mdo sde): mdzad/ / de bzhin gzhan yang thugs kyi bltam zhing me lce 'khrugs pa dang // zhing gzhan dag kyang chab kyis yongs su bltam par ston pa mdzad// rnam 'phrul 'di ni thams
287a2(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yul lags so/ / 'dul ba'i don du gzugs kyi rnam pa mthara' yas ston mdzad pa// la lar 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'dod chags gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur// tshangs pa'i
287a3(mdo sde): bdag po mchog tu zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rnyed pa dang / / sum cu rtsa gsum dbang phyug mig stong rdo rje 'bar ba dang // srog chags brgya phrag mang po rab tu dga' bas mchod bgyid cing // dge ba bcu po dag gis
287a4(mdo sde): sems can mtha' yas 'dul bgyid pa/ / blon po tshong dpon dag dang bka' la gtogs pa'i gtsor gyur cing // shin tu 'jigs med dgra tshogs phab nas chad pas mi gcod la// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi
287a5(mdo sde): pos sems can rnams ni sdud bgyid cing / / rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la sems can rab tu 'jog bgyid pa// bsod nams las kyis rin chen bdun dang ldan par gyur pa yi// gling bzhi dag gi dbang
287a6(mdo sde): phyug 'khor los sgyur ba dag tu gyur/ / 'jig rten 'di na la larabaltam pa lta bur ston mdzad de// dog sa la ni gom pa bdun dag bor zhing gshegs nas kyang // nga ni skyes nas skye dang 'chi ba'i tha mar
287a7(mdo sde): dbyung ngo zhes/ / yid 'ong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gsung mchog brjod pa mdzad// mar me mdzad pa tshun chad dri ma thams cad spangs lags kyang // 'gro rnams sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la
287b1(mdo sde): / yongs smin mdzad slad du// la lar sems can dag pa btsun mo'i 'khor na bzhugs par gdara'// mi yi dbang po btsun mo dag dang sras kyang ston pa mdzad// yab yum dag dang gnyen gyi rtsa lag sdug pa'i//
287b2(mdo sde): 'khor rnams dang // yul 'khor 'byor dang rin chen gter mdzod mang po bdang mdzad nas// brgya byin tshangs pa dag dang lha min rnams kyis phyag bgyis shing // drang srong chen po mngon par byung ste nags na
287b3(mdo sde): bzhugs par gda'/ / 'gro la sman slad dgung lo drug tu dka' ba spyad nas ni// bsam gtan mkha' khyab rin chen mchog la bsam gtan mdzad par gda'// mu stegs can gyi tshogs rnams thams cad
287b4(mdo sde): tshar gcang mdzad slad du/ / sems can dag pa byang chub shing drung du yang gshegs par gda'// 'gro rnams sangs rgyas ye shes mchog tu yongs smin mdzad slad du// mi dbang sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin
287b5(mdo sde): mchog la bzhugs mdzad nas/ / sku yi tshul ni gang gis 'jig rten rnam par 'dul 'gyur ba// rgyal ba de 'dra nyid kyi sku yi cha lugs 'dzin pa mdzad// ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis 'a gro ba rmongs par bgyid
287b6(mdo sde): slad du/ / sgyu ma mang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston bgyid pa// de bzhin 'gro ba'i sgron mas sems can 'dul bar mdzad slad du// sangs rgyas nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mang po rnams kyang ston//
287b7(mdo sde): thub pa dpa' bo la lar dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud 'dul ston// gang la pha rol mu stegs tshogs kyi 'gro ba ma mchis shing // rdul bral mya ngan ma mchis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa// bla na med pa
288a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba ma mchis 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ / khyod kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang nas byang chub brnyes// phyogs kyis lam rnams thams cad du yang 'khor lo skor ba/
288a2(mdo sde): mdzad// mi yi dbang po kun nas zhal ldan chu zla bzhin du zhugs// bde gshegs rang byung mtha' yas yul la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo// la la dag la sangs rgyas chos kyi sku ni ston
288a3(mdo sde): mdzad pa/ / rtag pa brtan pa ther zug 'gyur ba ma mchis gyur pa dang // ma bgyis ma skyes dri ma ma mchis 'gog pa ma mchis chos// mig yor 'dra bas phyogs bcu dag ni shin tu rgyas par 'gengs// /
288a4(mdo sde): ring por mi thogs par ni sdug pa dag dang bral 'gyur gyis// 'dus byas 'di la khyed cag yid brtan bya ba'i mi rigs zhes// 'gro ba thams cad rmi lam sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba dang // mi rtag mi brtan skad
288a5(mdo sde): cig par yang la la dag la ston/ / bde gshegs sku yi 'phrin las mtha' dang pha rol yong ma mchis// gsung dang thugs kyi 'jug pa'i spyod yul dag kyang dpag mi lang // nam mkha' lta bur rgya che tsha/
288a6(mdo sde): ma mchis pa ston mdzad de// rgyal ba spyod yul sems can rnams kyis 'tshal bar nus ma lags// phyogs bcu dag na mchis pa'i sems can ma lus ji snyed pa// de dag shA ri'i bu dang 'dra bar
288a7(mdo sde): shes rab ldan gyur kyang / / rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang po'i yul tshad ma mchis pa// rgyal ba'i spyod yul thams cad de dag rnams kyis rig mi nus// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mkhar 'dra ba
288b1(mdo sde): rol mtha' ma mchis/ / de ltar rgyal ba'i yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab ma lus pa// 'di ni rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun dang nyan thos rnams dang ni// rkyen gyi rgyal ba 'dus pa rnams kyis 'tshal bar nus ma lags//
288b2(mdo sde): de ltar 'di dag la sogs mtha' yas thabs dang ldan pa yis// 'dul ba'i don du sku yi mdzad pa mtha' yas ston par mdzad// nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs par mtha' yas sku dang ldan gyur pa// mgon po
288b3(mdo sde): rtog dang rnam par rtog dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rgya chen pha rol rab tu brgal gyur pa// nyon mongs thul ba rgyal ba 'gro ba'i gtso la bstod pa yi// bsod nams ci mchis des ni
288b4(mdo sde): 'di na 'gro ba ma lus pa/ / byang chub rin chen rab mchog zhi zhing bde la reg par shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
288b5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyis tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshogs su bcad pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de
288b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam zhes snyun gsol lo/ / nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang
288b7(mdo sde): ldan nam/ bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang snyun gsol lo// 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag 'jig rten gyi khams nyams dga' ba la ltar stsol cig ces kyang gsung ngo //
289a1(mdo sde): de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khang pa brtsegs pa'i bkod pa chen po des yongs su
289a2(mdo sde): khyab pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs dag kyang mthong nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin cing / de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can nas 'dir lhags pa 'di dag ci de bzhin gshegs pa
289a3(mdo sde): mthu 'am/ 'on te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gi mthu yin snyam mo// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyis mthus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos
289a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir khang pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par gda' ba ni/ bcom
289a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ / bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo mtshar to// gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags pa dag ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu
289a6(mdo sde): lags sam/ 'on te byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi mthu lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po
289a7(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par snang ba 'di na// de bzhin//
289b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mthu ma yin gyi/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob kyi mthu yin no//
289b2(mdo sde): gsol pa 'di ltar 'di dag gi mthus/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa du mas brgyan cing yongs su khyab par gda' ba ni/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis
289b3(mdo sde): kyi smon lam dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongs su sbyangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das
289b4(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa nas dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongs su spangs pa
289b5(mdo sde): yin no/ / pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa yin te/ 'di gnyis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par sprul pa 'di
289b6(mdo sde): lta bu 'di dag ston to/ / pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod yang shar kyi phyogs cha logs su de na ci snang ltos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos// byang
289b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig sgrib pa med pas bltas na/ shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan
290a1(mdo sde): 'das de dag thams cad kyi nabs la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpar chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'ar chen po mthu chen thong//
290a2(mdo sde): gnyis phyag 'tshal nas tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam zhes skun gsol
290a3(mdo sde): lo/ / nyam nga bzung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang snyun gsol lo zhes smra'o// de bzhin du lho'i phyogs cha dang / de bzhin du nub dang / de bzhin du byang dang /
290a4(mdo sde): de bzhin du 'og dang / de bzhin du steng dang / de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i bkod pa chen po du mas brgyan cing yongs su
290a5(mdo sde): khyab par mthong ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag kyang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis zhabs
290a6(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal bar yang mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang de shin tu ngo mtshar cher 'dzin par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom
290a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrubs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs
290b1(mdo sde): pa mchog tu ngo mtshar to/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ting nge 'dzin la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na gda' ba'i slad du'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta
290b2(mdo sde): bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas
290b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dag dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba mthong ba dang / de bzhin du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs
290b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing dag mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngag dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngag gi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba mthong ba dang /
290b5(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor srog chags sum khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad do//
290b6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang las
290b7(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid cig lags/ de'i mtshan ni ci zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
291a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyis legs par bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang de'i bya ba dang / de'i spyod pa dang / de'i smon lam
291a2(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur te/ de lta bas na pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos/ bcom
291a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal
291a4(mdo sde): pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ yangs pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong gi rdul phra rab ji snyed yod pa/ de snyed du tshad med pa/ de skad du bsam
291a5(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji tsam yod pa de bas kyang ches mang ba'i bskal pa byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa bde ba kun tu ston pa
291a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
291a7(mdo sde): bu 'dul ba'i ba lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi'i ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byung ste/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po bcom ldan
291b1(mdo sde): ' das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yon tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa de dag dpe cung
291b2(mdo sde): zang tsam gyis cung zad cig brjod par byas nyon cig/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
291b3(mdo sde): 'od dpag med kyis byas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa mang ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so// bsam gyis mi khyab tshad ma mchis te/ ngag gi las kyis lan gdab par sla ba ma lags so// /
291b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig gis skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i rtse mos rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs na/ pad+ma'i
291b5(mdo sde): dpal gyi snying po 'di ji snyam du sems/ ru blangs pa dang lhag ma lus pa de gang mang / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das blangs pa ni nyung / lhag ma lus pa ni tshad ma mchis so// bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i
291b6(mdo sde): dpal gyi snying po khyed mos par bya'o/ / khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o// mi des skra'i rtse mo brgyar bshags pa'i rtse mo des rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs pa ji snyed pa de tsam du/ de bzhin
291b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o/ / rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po ji snyed pa de tsam du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
292a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa/ bde ba kun tu ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yon tan bkod par blta'o/
292a2(mdo sde): / de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang dpag tu med de/ ji ltar da lta na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi nyan thos kyi dge
292a3(mdo sde): 'dun dpag tu med do zhes bya na/ de las brgya stong du bsgres pa bas kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par
292a4(mdo sde): rol pa'i rgyal po de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ches mang ngo / / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun kyang de snyed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de ni theg pa gsum kho na las
292a5(mdo sde): brtsams te chos ston to/ / pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po ngas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser
292a6(mdo sde): 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / nyan thos kyi yon tan bkod pa dang / bde ba'i rgyu las brtsams te chos bstan par 'dod kyang / nga'i spobs
292a7(mdo sde): pa yang zad par mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de'i mthar phyin par yang mi 'gyur ro// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
292b1(mdo sde): / gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i gsung rab la/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi dbang phyug chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya ba'i rgyal po zhig byung ste/ pad+ma'i
292b2(mdo sde): dpal gyi snying po rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la bu bye ba phrag brgya yod de/ rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan par gyur to// de dag thams cad bla
292b3(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to/ / pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi yongs su longs spyod pa'i skyed mos tshal ni bdun khri drug
292b4(mdo sde): stong yod do/ / rgyal bu re re la yang longs spyod kyi skyed mos tshal khri khri yod do// bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
292b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ni med do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming yang mi grag
292b6(mdo sde): ste/ rgyal po gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyang tshangs par spong pa las gyur pa rdzus te byung ba sha stag go// sems can de dag thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang / chos kyi dga' ba'i
292b7(mdo sde): zas can yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni kha zas rags po med par gyur to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de ni las gzhan med de/ bu de rnams dang lhan cig bcom ldan
293a1(mdo sde): 'das de la lo bye ba stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du bsnyen bkur byas so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ tshad med pa'i
293a2(mdo sde): phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ / pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po tshad med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po 'di la byang chub
293a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen pos spyod pa tshad med pa dag don du gnyer bar mi bya ba de gang yang med do/ / rdul ba tshad med pa gang dag brtsam par mi bya ba de gang yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
293a4(mdo sde): kyi sbyin pa ni tshad med/ tshul khrims ni tshad med/ bzod pa ni tshad med/ brtson 'grus ni tshad med/ bsam gtan ni tshad med/ shes rab ni tshad med/ 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin pa ni tshad med/ sems can dag
293a5(mdo sde): la byams pa ni tshad med/ zhing gi bkod pa dag ni tshad med/ nyan thos dag ni tshad med/ gzugs yongs su grub pa ni tshad med/ dbyangs ni tshad med/ spobs pa ni tshad med pa'i phyir ro// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po
293a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni tha ma sems bskyed pa gcig gis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci mngon par 'du byed pa de dag thams cad tshad med pa nyid du yongs su sngo'o// ji ltar yongs su bsngos pas tshad med par 'gyur
293a7(mdo sde): zhe na/ gang gi tshe sems can thams cad la yongs su sngo bar byed pa de'i tshe sems can 'di dag thams cad skye ba med par mngon sum du byed/ sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan/
293b1(mdo sde): las 'da' bar 'gyur ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu yongs su sngo ba tshad med pa zhes bya'o// stong pa nyid tshad med pa'o// mtshan ma med pa tshad med pa'o// smon pa med pa tshad med pa'o// mngon par 'du bya
293b2(mdo sde): ba med pa tshad med pa'o/ / de ltar na 'dod chags dang bral ba/ yang dag pa'i mtha'/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par grol ba/ ma skyes pa/ dben pa/ bral ba/ mya ngan las 'das pa/ tshad med pa
293b3(mdo sde): ste/ rigs kyi bu mdor na chos thams cad ni tshad med pa'o// de'i phyir chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa zhes bya'o// gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de ni tshad med pa'o// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de bzhin/
293b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal pos de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshad med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la
293b5(mdo sde): mkhas pa 'di yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ / des kyang chos tshad med pa dag la nges par sems par byas par gyur to// de nas rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
293b6(mdo sde): de las chos dpag tu med pa bstan pa 'di thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu ste yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bu de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de la tshigs su bcad
293b7(mdo sde): pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ 'dren pa chos rnams kun la dbang sgyur ba// smra ba'i tshogs kun yang dag rab tu 'joms// bdud kyis rtso dang nyon mongs kun sel ba// mtshungs med ye shes
294a1(mdo sde): mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ / nyi zla dag dang me yi 'od rnams dang // brgya byin tshangs pa nor bu grog 'od rnams// bde gshegs gzi brjid kyis ni mog mog gyur// mi
294a2(mdo sde): mchog 'od mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / thub pa bskal pa rgya mtsho 'das par yang // dka' ba rnam pa du ma spang ba mdzad// 'phrin las de yi 'bras bu yid 'ong ste/ des na 'gro bas bltas na ngoms
294a3(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ / skye dang rga dang na dang 'chis gtses shing // sems can sdug bsngal mang bas gzir gzigs nas// de dag rnams la thub chen thugs rje ste// rtag tu mi 'pho zhi ba'i chos kyang ston//
294a4(mdo sde): srid gsum srog chags kun gyi sman pa 'dra// 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa thams cad sbyong // thugs rje bskyed pa mdzad nas chos kyi sman// zhi ba bla na med pa rab tu ston// sems can kun gyi
294a5(mdo sde): spyod pa rab tu mkhyen/ / rab 'byam zhing rnams kun na srog chags kyi// mkhyen nas gang gis mya ngan 'das mchog la// reg par 'gyur ba de 'dra'i chos kyang ston// mi mchog khyod kyi thugs
294a6(mdo sde): rjeci 'dra ba/ / ji snyed rab 'byam zhing gi nyan thos dang // rkyen byung thub pa ma lus de dag la// de 'dra ba yi snying rje yongs ma mchis// bsod nams phung po mtshan mchog rnams dang ldan/
294a7(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sku ni gser gyi ri bo 'dra// bye ba gnyis las lhag pa'i gzi mnga' ba// mi mchog mtshungs ma mchis la phyag 'tshal lo// chos sprin rgyas las chos char 'bebs pa na// gang dag rgya
294b1(mdo sde): chen mos pa spyod yul ba/ / sngon gyi sangs rgyas spyod la 'jigs ma mchis// de dag rtag tu bde gshegs mdun na mchis// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su// mi mchog mthong ba
294b2(mdo sde): rnyed par shin tu dka'/ / bsod nams las kyis bsam pa yongs sbyangs pa// de dag mig lam rnam par 'dren rnams gda'// rgyal ba'i sku ni chos dbyings rgyas par 'gengs// zhing rnams rab
294b3(mdo sde): 'byam thams cad na yang gda'/ / bzhud dang byon par mngon pa yod ma mchis// 'on kyang 'jig rten dag na snod bzhin gda'// bden pa gzigs shing don dam ston pa po// chos kyi sbyin bdag
294b4(mdo sde): zhi ba'i thugs ldan pa/ / brgal nas srog chags bcings gyur gzhan sgrol ba// bde bar gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis skye ba'i shing ljon rtsa nas bton// nga rgyal ri bo sra bo rdul du
294b5(mdo sde): brlags/ / rgod pa mi mnga' g.yo dang sgyu dang bral// rab ni thugs dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// mi mchog chags pa thams cad yong mi mnga'// dgongs pa sa dang chu dang me dang 'dra// rgyal ba
294b6(mdo sde): sems can kun la snyoms thugs ldan/ / rlung dang nam mkha' 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa chen po yon tan 'di 'dra'i gter// bsod nams rgya mtsho las byung sku dang ldan// bskal pa khrag
294b7(mdo sde): khrig dag tu de brjod kyang / / yon tan rgya mtsho zang par nus ma lags// yon tan mnga' ba lha mis mchod pa la// bdag ni bu dang bcas te mchod pa bgyid// rgyal ba mchod pa'i bsod nams ci mchis
295a1(mdo sde): sas+ho/ / / sasu k+Sha/ na
295a2(mdo sde): rgya rnas pas nas shi sa pa klu sa g.yon nas dus l+h+wam sgyu / zugapas s+yAd+hA // sna de gnyis sas su da
295a3(mdo sde): chen mchog ces kya ba gnyis rdzus te zung nas skyil mo klungasas te 'dug go/ / 'a pal gyi snying po de ltar rgyal po dpal gyiga'i hrI de ting nge dzin de las la spyan/ kyeru gnyis skyil mo
295a4(mdo sde): bcas te 'dug pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// khyod gnyis lha ram klu yin nam// gnod sbyin dri za mi 'am ci// mi 'am mi ma yin nam Ti// dris pa smos
295a5(mdo sde): shig grogs po dag/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi g.yas phyogs su byung ba'i khye'u gang yin pa des/ rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ grags
295a6(mdo sde): po chos kun stong pa yi/ / ming ni 'dri bar byed dam ci// chos rnams thams cad ming med na// gang ni ming ni 'dri bar byed// stong nyid gang la lnga med cing // klu med srin po yod ma yin// me 'am mim
295a7(mdo sde): yin yang rung / thams cad den mong med do// 'ad+ma'i dpal gyi snying ngo po// de nas bye cig shos des/ rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ming ni ming gis stong bste/
295b1(mdo sde): ming la ming ni yod ma yin// chos rnams thams cad ming med de// 'on kyang ming gis yongs su brjod// ming gi rang bzhin gang yin pa// des ni ma mthong ma thos so// las kyis 'gags pa ma yin/
295b2(mdo sde): na// 'di na gang gi ming zhig 'dri// tha snyad du ni ming byas nas// ming btags byas te bstan pa ni// kho bo'i ming ni rin chen sems// cig shos rin chen mchog ces bya// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar
295b3(mdo sde): khye'u gnyis kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras te/ mngon par shes pa lnga bsgrubs nas// rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de dang lhan cig tu// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
295b4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od song gi rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
295b5(mdo sde): gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ pad+ma dag dang dri bda' dang // me tog
295b6(mdo sde): 'phreng dang na bza' 'am/ / 'on te zas dang skom gyis sam// rgyal ba ji ltar mchod par bgyi// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso// ji ltar mchod par gyur pa lags// don 'di legs
295b7(mdo sde): par bstan du gsol/ / 'dren pa thos nas 'tshal bar bgyi// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des/ khye'u de gnyis la tshogs su bcad de/
296a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ lus can kun la phan pa'i phyir// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed na// mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas dag la mchod par 'gyur// mi gang
296a2(mdo sde): zhig gis sangs rgyas zhing / / gang+gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed dag/ me tog rnams kyis bkang byas te// 'jig rten mgon po phul ba bas// gang gis 'dir ni thal sbyar nas// byang chub tu ni sems btud
296a3(mdo sde): na/ / 'di ni bsod nams ches mang ste// de la tshad ni yod ma yin// byang chub sems ni ci 'dra ba// de ltar blo mchog gis bstan pa// de 'dra'i mchod pa gang yang med// de 'dra ba yi dpal yang
296a4(mdo sde): med/ / pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis/ slar yang bcom ldan 'das de la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// bdag cag yi dam yang dag 'chas//
296a5(mdo sde): bla na med pa'i seng ge'i sgra// lha dang mi dag gsan mdzod cig/ ji srid du ni 'khor ba yi// sngon gyi mthar ni mi dmigs pa// de srid bskal pa du mar yang // sems can phyir ni spyad par bgyi//
296a6(mdo sde): ji tsam sngon gyi mtha' dran pa// rnam grangs 'di yi tshul dag gis// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// de srid bskal par spyad par bgyi// gal te de ring slan chad du// 'dod rlugs
296a7(mdo sde): kyi ni sems byung na/ / phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams ni bslus par 'gyur// de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dang // phrag dog ser sna'ang de bzhin no// rtag tu bden pa'i tshig
296b1(mdo sde): smra zhing / / brdzun gyi tshig ni spang bar bgyi// gal te de ring sran chad du// rdul med byang chub ma thob par// bdag cag nyan thos sems gyur na// dus ni brdzun du smra bar 'gyur// nams/
296b2(mdo sde): kyang rang sangs rgyas su ni// bdag cag dga' bar mi bgyid de// sems can rnams la snying rje zhing // bskal pa bye bar spad par bgyi// ji ltar 'dren pa khyod kyi zhing // grub pa rnam pa 'di
296b3(mdo sde): dag las/ / gzhan du yon tan bye ba snyed// phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing du bgyi// de na nyan thos gang yang med// rang rgyal 'dren pa dag kyang med// de tshe bye ba'i tshad med pa'i// byang chub
296b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gnas/ / bde ba 'di dang ldan pa yi// skye bo dri ma med par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mdzod ni bzung bas na// sangs rgyas chos rnams tshar phyin to// gal te 'di dag
296b5(mdo sde): gzhan min par/ / de bzhin du ni 'gyur des na// rgya mtshor bcas dang rir bcas pa'i// sa 'di thams cad g.yos par sheshog/ tshig 'di smras pa'i mod la ni// sa yang rab tu g.yos par gyur// /
296b6(mdo sde): sil snyan dag ni ma dkrol bar// de na thams cad sgra yang 'byin// stong phrag bye ba'i lha rnams kyis// me tog char dang phye ma'i char// spos kyi char ni yid 'ong dang // na bza' bye ba rab tu phag/
296b7(mdo sde): pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs sam yid gnyis za na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na// de bzhin
297a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya bar gyur to// pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i
297a2(mdo sde): tshe de'i dus na/ khye'u rin chen sems dang / rin chen mchog ces bya ba de gnyis gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ de yang de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan
297a3(mdo sde): ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni khye'u rin chen mchog ces bya bar gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob 'di ni khye'u rin chen sems shes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis
297a4(mdo sde): ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed pa ni de yin no/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying
297a5(mdo sde): pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ji tsam du zab mo la mos par gyur pa dang / gang gi ming yang ma dmigs pa de srid du/ 'di gnyis byang chub tu sems bskyed par
297a6(mdo sde): gyur pa ngo mtshar to/ / bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i pha rol na/ sangs rgyas ji skad cig la rim gro bgyis par gyur/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang+gA'i
297a7(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma ni bgrang bas mtha' rtogs par nus kyi/ skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i pha rol na/ sangs rgyas dag la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni
297b1(mdo sde): de lta ma yin te/ de srid du 'di gnyis kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed do// skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos shing yon tan dpag du med pa dang ldan te/ 'di gnyis kyi yon/
297b2(mdo sde): tan dag gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag
297b3(mdo sde): tu med pa/ bde ba kun tu ston pa zhes bgyi ba de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de 'di nas phyogs gang logs na mchis/
297b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs logs na ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med
297b5(mdo sde): pa/ bde ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya bar gyur to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
297b6(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skya bo phal po che dang / lha dang / mi nams
297b7(mdo sde): kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / tshe
298a1(mdo sde): tsam pa dang / longs spyod ci 'dra ba dang / 'od ci 'dra ba dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
298a2(mdo sde): nas/ mtshan ji skad ces bgyi ba de dag legs par bstan du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi smon lam chen po bshad pa thos nas//
298a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal
298a4(mdo sde): gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos
298a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bkar stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag
298a6(mdo sde): med kyi tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med de/ de'i mthar ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du bshad kyang rtogs par sla ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi tshe
298a7(mdo sde): dpag tu med du zin kyang / 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ ther zug ma yin pa/ yun du gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na
298b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro/ / de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas
298b2(mdo sde): kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du de'i dam pa'i chos gnas te/ ji ltar bzhugs pa de bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / sems can rnams
298b3(mdo sde): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub ste/ lhag chad med par 'gyur ro// gzhan du na sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ba med par zad do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang
298b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur/ de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'od dpag med yongs su mya ngan las
298b5(mdo sde): 'das nas kyang / rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma dag dang / shing ljon pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de ji ltar chos ston pa de bzhin du/ pad+ma dag dang / shing ljon pa de dag las kyang chos kyi sgo brgya phrag
298b6(mdo sde): du ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ dam pa'i chos nub ma thag pa'i mtshan mo skya rengs 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe
298b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rin po che du ma bkod pa'i byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
299a1(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya'o/ / de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'od gzer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'od/
299a2(mdo sde): gzer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bstan
299a3(mdo sde): kyang mthar rtogs par mi nus so/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i bde ba'i rgyu dang / yon tan gyi rgyu ni de snyed du 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang rigs kyi bu dpe tsam du cung zad cig bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
299a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yon tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa/ yon tan gyi bkod pa snga ma dag ni yon tan bkod pa 'di dag gi brgya'i char
299a5(mdo sde): yang mi chog/ stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ming yang med par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas
299a6(mdo sde): kyi zhing de ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis gang bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu da ltar bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed pa
299a7(mdo sde): de dag thams cad bsdus kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi brgya'i char yang mi chog sde
299b1(mdo sde): stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do// de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu 'gyur ro// de'i dam pa'i chos ni bskal pa
299b2(mdo sde): bye ba drug cu rtsa gsum du gnas par 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
299b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming yang bde ba can zhes bgyi bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin te/ 'jig rten gyi khams da ni rin chen kun nas bsags pa
299b4(mdo sde): zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po'i tshe ji srid gnas pa nas bzung ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de srid du/ byang chub
299b5(mdo sde): sems dpar mthu chen thob mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ / yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang de'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur te/ dam pa'i chos yun ring por gnas par bya ba'i phyir spro bar 'gyur ro//
299b6(mdo sde): phyi ma'i dus su der dam pa'i chos nub nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang sa
299b7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
300a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das yon tan shin tu gnas pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
300a2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de'i byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa dang / snang ba phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba de ltar/ bcom ldan 'das de
300a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shin tu gnas pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de'i yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ lhag chad med cing shin tu lhag pa med par 'gyur ro// tshe'i yun dang dam pa'i chos gnas pa
300a4(mdo sde): yang de srid du 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gzer kun nas 'phags pa'i dpal brtsegs rgyal po de dang / bcom ldan 'das
300a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shin tu gnas pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de'i mtshan thos pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /
300a6(mdo sde): pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po bud med gang la las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dang / ma 'ongs pa de gnyis kyi mtshan
300a7(mdo sde): thos na/ de bud med kyi rang bzhin du mi 'gyur ro// bskal pa bye ba phrag bzhi bcur 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mthong
300b1(mdo sde): pa dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ tshe brjes nas kyang rab tu 'byung ba 'thob par 'gyur/ tshe rabs dran pa dang / spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur/
300b2(mdo sde): gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha dang / mi dang / skye dgu'i srog chags bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ gang dag ma gyon pa de dag dang / gang dag daN+Da
300b3(mdo sde): bzhugs pa 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag dang / phyogs bcu na gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gi mtshan gang lags pa de dag la yang rjes
300b4(mdo sde): su yi rang ngo / / tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lhan cig tshogs pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o zhes smras so//
300b5(mdo sde): de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// srog chags khrag khrig brgya phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba
300b6(mdo sde): rnam par dag go/ dge slong bdun sdong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
300b7(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas pas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis phyogs bcu na/ bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa de
301a1(mdo sde): dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa mthong ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas so/ / mthong nas kyang tshig 'di skad ces 'dzer te/
301a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis legs par yongs su bzung ba lags te/ 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis sangs rgyas
301a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'di snyed cig gis lung ston pa ni ngo mtshar to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/
301a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa
301a5(mdo sde): de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su 'dri ba'i gtam 'dis ci zhig bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
301a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu sems can dman pa la mos pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa la yid mi ches par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar 'di dag yun ring por gnod pa dang / phan pa med pa dang / bde ba med pa dang /
301a7(mdo sde): log par ltung bar 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag rgya chen po la mos pa dang / mos pa mang ba dag kyang mchis/ srang ma'i skye bo rnams la
301b1(mdo sde): yang snang ba gyis par 'gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pas skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du bshad par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying
301b2(mdo sde): po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do/ / byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang //
301b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di la mi gang la la stobs dang ldan pa/ mthu dang ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ ji tsam sems can gyi khams su gdagrangs
301b4(mdo sde): btag pa'i sems can gyi khams de ni de bzhin gshegapa ches mang bar gsungs kyi/ sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin te/ sems can de dag thams cad bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas mu med par mgo bo 'am/ phrag pa 'am/ lag pa
301b5(mdo sde): na thogs te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar de dag la gos dang zas dag byin te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byed/ bla mar byed na/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po mi de gzhi de las bsod nams kyi phung po mang du
301b6(mdo sde): 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ sems can gcig la yang se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig byams pa'i sems kyis khyab par bgyis na/ de tsam gyis kyang bsod nams mang du skyed na/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas
301b7(mdo sde): mu ma mchis par sems can thams cad bzung ste/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro bgyis pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod mos par bya'o// khyod kyis
302a1(mdo sde): khong du chud par bya'o/ / gang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di byang chub kyi sems la gnas te len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
302a2(mdo sde): klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dad pa la zhugs pa/ mos pa mang ba dag gzhi de las bsod
302a3(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po ches mang du skyed do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsung
302a4(mdo sde): pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bdag gis blang bar bgyi/ gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun rlab par bgyi/
302a5(mdo sde): gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying pos tshig de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpar bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gis
302a6(mdo sde): dbyangs gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di blang bar bgyi/ gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par
302a7(mdo sde): bgyi/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad bka' stsal to// pad+ma'i
302b1(mdo sde): dpal gyi snying po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bud med kyis thos ma thag tu bud med kyi dngos po las 'gyur te/ rgyu gnyis ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ phrag dog dang / ser sna'o// de nas lha'i dbang po /
302b2(mdo sde): byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag gis lha'i me tog man+da ra ba dag bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
302b3(mdo sde): dag la mngon par gtor to/ / lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gsil nas tshig 'di skad ces kyang 'dzer ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grags pa dang / legs par ston
302b4(mdo sde): nas 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu sten pa'i sems can de dag gis ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed par lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag
302b5(mdo sde): ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi lag na 'dug pa dang / gang dag thos nas mos par 'gyur ring sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas khri la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro//
302b6(mdo sde): de nas sring mo rdul dang bral zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa de stan las langs nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pas
302b7(mdo sde): phrag dog dang ser sna spangs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni med pa gsungs pa lags na/ bcom ldan
303a1(mdo sde): 'das gal te bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhing / bud med gzhan gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na/ thos pa'i mod la bud med kyi dngos po las 'gyur ba lta na
303a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du phung po 'di nyid la bud med kyi dbang po mi gda' bar gyur te/ skyes pa'i dbang po byung bar gyur cig ces smras so// de nas snying mo de de nyid du bud med kyi dbang po mi snang bar gyur
303a3(mdo sde): te skyes pa'i dbang po byung bar gyur to/ / de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
303a4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyon mongs pa thams cad klog pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i
303a5(mdo sde): dpal gyi snying po dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
303a6(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i yang rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la la sogs pa dang /
303a7(mdo sde): zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing gtan la bab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sang gA ta sU tra d+harmA r+ye ya/
303b1(mdo sde): bod skad du/ 'phags bzung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs// / bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
303b2(mdo sde): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slog dge 'dun chen po dge slong sum khri nyis stong la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang / tshe dang
303b3(mdo sde): ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba ku la dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang skyong dang /
303b4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa bzang dpal dang / tshe dang ldan pa tsan dan dpal dang / tshe dang ldan pa dug sel dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' sde dang / de la sogs pa
303b5(mdo sde): dge slong sum khri nyis stong dang / byang chub sems dpa' drug khri nyis stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu
303b6(mdo sde): dpa' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nur gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
303b7(mdo sde): chen po gzhon nu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'bri dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
304a1(mdo sde): po kun du bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blta na sdug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde dang / byang chub sems dpa'
304a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i sde dang / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po drug khri nyis stong dang / lha'i bu khri nyis stong la 'di lta ste/ lha'i bu srid sgrub dang / lha'i bu bzang po dang / lha'i
304a3(mdo sde): bu shin tu bzang po dang / lha'i bu chos 'dod dang / lha'i bu tsan dan snying po dang // lha'i bu tsan dan gnas dang / lha'i bu tsan dan dang / de la sogs pa lha'i bu khri nyis stong dang / lha'i bu mo brgyad stong la 'di lta ste/
304a4(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo rnga ldan dang / lha'i bu mo mdzes ldan dang / lha'i bu mo bdag nyid che ldan dang / lha'i bu mo mig dpa' dang / lha'i bu mo skye dgu'i bdag mo gnas pa dang / lha'i bu mo stobs 'dzin dang / lha'i mo nor
304a5(mdo sde): dpal dang / lha'i bu mo lag pa bzang ldan dang / de la sogs pa'i bu mo brgyad stong dang / klu'i rgyal po brgyad stong la 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po sog ma med dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma dang /
304a6(mdo sde): klu rgyal po na ming dang / gru'i rgyal po bum pa'i snying po dang / klu'i rgyal po dum pa mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po dge byed dang / klu'i rgyal po shin tu dga' ba dang / klu'i rgyal po mdab bzangs dang / klu
304a7(mdo sde): rgyal po thang po mgo dang / de la sogs pa'i klu'i rgyal po brgyad stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de dag thams cad kyang rgyal po'i khab gal ba dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba dang / bcom ldan
304b1(mdo sde): 'das ka la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod pa dang /
304b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu bzar nas/ pus
304b3(mdo sde): mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha bye ba dang / lha'i bu mo bya ba dang /
304b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba mang po dang / bcom ldan 'das nyan thos bye ba mang po dang / klu'i rgyal po rnams kyang chos nyan pa'i slad du/ 'dus nas 'khod cing mchis na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
304b5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa ji lta bus sems can rgan po rnams ni thos ma thag tu las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can gzhon nu rnams
304b6(mdo sde): ni dge ba'i chos rnams la mngon par brtson zhing khyad par du 'phags pa thos par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i chos rnams las mi nyams/ yongs su mi nyams shing yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur pa de lta bu'i chos
304b7(mdo sde): kyi tshul la 'jug pa de legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
305a1(mdo sde): kun tu dpa' ba khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni kun tu dpa' ba legs so legs so// kun tu dpa' ba khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la rung shig dang /
305a2(mdo sde): ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la
305a3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kun tu dpa' ba zung zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang da ltar yang 'dzam bu'i gling na smod pa zhig yod do// gang la la zhig zung gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na/ de'i
305a4(mdo sde): mtshams med pa lnga'i las nams 'byang zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// kun tu dpa' ba 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang gis zung gi mdo thos na/ de
305a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa de skyed par 'gyur ro snyam na yang / kun tu dpa' ba de ltar mi blta'o// kun tu dpa' bas gsol pa/ 'o na ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom
305a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu dpa' ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed par byang
305a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang bsod nams kyi phung po yang de snyed par 'gyur ro/ / kun tu dpa' ba gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag thams cad ni phyir mi ldog par
305b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag
305b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / de dag thams cad kyis dge ba'i chos gang dag 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag la bdud sdig can gyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro// kun tu dpa' ba
305b3(mdo sde): gang dag zung gi mdo 'di thos pa de dag thams cad skye ba dang 'gag pa shes par 'gyur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad de'i tshe stan las langs te/ bra gos phrag pa
305b4(mdo sde): gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsug te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed cig mchis/ bcom ldan
305b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas gcig gi bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad nyon cig/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i thigs pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab ji snyed pa dang /
305b6(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po bas ni/ sangs rgyas gcig gi
305b7(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang ngo / / gang zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa'i sems can rnams ni bsod nams kyi phung po de bas kyang ches mang du skyed par 'gyur te/ des bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa ni/
306a1(mdo sde): bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par mi nus so// kun tu dpa' ba de'i tshe de'i dus na gang tshig 'di thos nas/ spro ba chen por 'gyur ba de ni bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa skyed par
306a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang chos kyis yongs su sgom par 'gyur ba de dag gang lags
306a3(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun tu dpa' ba sems can gnyis po 'di dag ni/ chos kyis yongs su
306a4(mdo sde): skom pa yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ kun tu dpa' ba 'di lta ste/ gcig ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'o// kun tu dpa' ba gnyis pa ni gang chos thos nas/ sems can thams cad la mtshungs par yang
306a5(mdo sde): dag par rab tu ston pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dpa' bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thos nas/ sems can thams cad la mtshungs par yang dag par rab tu ston pa gang lags/ bcom ldan
306a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu dpa' ba gcig ni chos thos nas byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ nam byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir chos kyis yongs su skom pa yin no//
306a7(mdo sde): kun tu dpa' ba gnyis pa ni/ gang theg pa chen po la 'jug pa ste/ rtag tu yang chos kyi yongs su skom pa yin no// de nas lha dang / klu dang / mi dang lha'i bu mo bye ba stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
306b1(mdo sde): spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang chos kyis yongs su skom zhing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dang / sems can thams
306b2(mdo sde): cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' bstan las langs nas/ bcom ldan
306b3(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
306b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba la bka' stsal pa/ kun tu dpa' ba sems can gang dag 'dir lhags nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba

307a1(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dpal zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
307a2(mdo sde): pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes du 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo // kun tu dpa' ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/
307a3(mdo sde): nga bram ze'i khye'u zhig tu gyur te/ ngas sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la so sor bkod pa de dag thams cad/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ ri dgas su gyur nas/ ngas de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'di
307a4(mdo sde): skad du da lngar ri dgas gang la la sdug bsngal gyis yongs su gzir bar gyur pa de dag thams cad/ nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig/ de dag thams cad kyang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi
307a5(mdo sde): ye shes la so sor 'god par gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste/ ri dgas de dag gis kyang tshig de thos nas/ de bzhin du gyur cig ces de skad smras te/ kun tu dpa' ba dge ba'i rtsa ba des na/ sems
307a6(mdo sde): can de dag 'dir lhags te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' bas
307a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das las spro ba chen po thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag gi tshe'i tshad ji srid cig thub par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
307b1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ sems can de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad cu thub par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpar kun tu dpa' bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bskal pa'i tshad ji tsam lags/ bcom ldan

307b3(mdo sde): sha stag gis yongs su gang bar byas la/ de nas mi des lo stong 'das shing / ra ba til gyi 'brus yongs su gang ba de las til gyi 'bru gcig phyi rol du bor te de lta bu'i tshul du mi des/ til gyi 'bru de dag
307b4(mdo sde): thams cad zad par byas la/ ra ba de rmang yang med/ gzhi yang med par gyur du zin kyang / bskal pa ni zad par mi 'gyur ro// kun tu dpa' ba gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/ ri rngams su dpag tshad ldan
307b5(mdo sde): 'phang du dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa zhig yod la/ de nas mi la la zhig gis/ ri de'i ngos la khyim brtsigs te/ dus ring po lo brgya 'das shing / ka shi ka'i ras kyis lan cig phyis te/ de ltar byas pas

307b7(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsngo ba gcig kyang bsod nams kyi phung po mang du skyed pa ni 'di lta ste/ bde bar tshe'i tshad bskal pa dgu cu thub par 'gyur na
308a1(mdo sde): gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la bsnyen bkur shin tu mang por bgyid pa lnga smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig/
308a2(mdo sde): gang zung gi chos kyi rnam grangs thos pa de'i tshe tshad kyang bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong thub par 'gyur na/ kun tu dpa' ba gang zung gi mdo yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa lta ci smos te/ kun tu
308a3(mdo sde): dpa' ba de ni bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang por skyed par 'gyur ro/ / kun tu dpa' ba sems dang ba gang zhig zung gi mdo la snying thag pa nas phyag 'tshal ba ni/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa lngar tshe rab
308a4(mdo sde): dran par 'gyur ro/ / bskal pa drug bcu'i bar du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la yang thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// kun tu dpa' ba de ni mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed
308a5(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur/ dug gis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de la byad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// 'chi bar yang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur te/
308a6(mdo sde): kun tu dpa' ba sangs rgya bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang de la skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs chen po legs par bshad pa thos pas/ bsod nams kyi phung po 'di skye ste/
308a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu po de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams so sor lung ston par 'gyur na/ kun tu dpa' ba gang zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs chen po 'a
308b1(mdo sde): / mtha' dag rdzogs par rgya cher thos pa lta ci smos kyis ma 'jigs shig ces dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' bas 'di

308b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu dpa' ba khyod chos rnams kyis ngoms mi shes pa ni legs so legs so// kun tu dpa' ba nga yang chos rnams kyis ngoms mi shes na/ kun tu dpa' ba byis pa so so'i skye
308b6(mdo sde): bo rnams kyis ngoms mi myong bar bya ba lta ci smos/ kun tu dpa' ba rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la theg pa chen po la dad paskyed pa de bskal pa stong phrag du ma log par lhung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur/
308b7(mdo sde): bskal pa lnga stong du dud 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur/ bskal pa khri nyis stong du blo ngan par mi 'gyur/ bskal pa khri brgyad stong du mtha' 'khob kyi skye bar mi 'gyur/ bskal pa nyi khrir bar tu sbyin pa la dga' bar 'gyur/

309a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / de la 'dud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// nam du yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// kun tu dpa' ba gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag ni gang dang gang du skye ba yang
309a4(mdo sde): bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa lngar log par srung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ / bskal pa brgyad khrir thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bskal pa stong du srog gcod pa spong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa dgu khri dgu stong brdzun du
309a5(mdo sde): smra ba spong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa khri sum stong du phra ma'i chog spong bar 'gyur te/ kun du dpa' ba gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa'i sems can de dag ni rnyed par dka'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa
309a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba tung nas/
309a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba dag sdig pa'i las kyi phung po ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
